8471073Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLine    using System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly Queue<int>[] queues = new Queue<int>[5];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static readonly object[] syncs = new object[5];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                queues[i] = new Queue<int>();Di2015NewLine                syncs[i] = new object();Di2015NewLine                var thread = new Thread(ThreadProc);Di2015NewLine                thread.Start(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine                int index = random.Next(queues.Length);Di2015NewLine                lock (syncs[index])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int message = random.Next(100);Di2015NewLine                    queues[index].Enqueue(message);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Sending message " + message + " to thread at " + index);Di2015NewLine                    Monitor.Pulse(syncs[index]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ThreadProc(object data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var index = (int)data;Di2015NewLine            lock (syncs[index])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while (queues[index].Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Monitor.Wait(syncs[index]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    int message = queues[index].Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Thread at " + index + " received message " + message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8474136Di2015UniqueSeparator private static volatile int _dummy; // just to avoid any optimisationsDi2015NewLine                                         // that have us measuring the wrongDi2015NewLine                                         // thing. Especially since the differenceDi2015NewLine                                         // is more noticable in a release buildDi2015NewLine                                         // (also more noticable on a multi-coreDi2015NewLine                                         // machine than single- or dual-core).Di2015NewLine static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch sw1 = new System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine     Thread[] threads = new Thread[20];Di2015NewLine     sw1.Start();Di2015NewLine     for(int t = 0; t != 20; ++t)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        threads[t] = new Thread(DoSA);Di2015NewLine        threads[t].Start();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     for(int t = 0; t != 20; ++t)Di2015NewLine        threads[t].Join();Di2015NewLine     Console.WriteLine(sw1.ElapsedTicks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch sw2 = new System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine     threads = new Thread[20];Di2015NewLine     sw2.Start();Di2015NewLine     for(int t = 0; 8476974Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static boolean isNullOrEmpty(String s) {Di2015NewLine    return s == null || s.length() == 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static boolean isNullOrWhitespace(String s) {Di2015NewLine    return s == null || isWhitespace(s);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static boolean isWhitespace(String s) {Di2015NewLine    int length = s.length();Di2015NewLine    if (length > 0) {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if (!Character.isWhitespace(s.charAt(i))) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8476974Di2015UniqueSeparator// checking for whitespace like String.trim() doesDi2015NewLineprivate static boolean isWhitespace(String s) {Di2015NewLine    int length = s.length();Di2015NewLine    if (length > 0) {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if (s.charAt(i) > ' ') {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8476974Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static boolean isWhitespace(String s) {Di2015NewLine    int length = s.length();Di2015NewLine    if (length > 0) {Di2015NewLine        for (int start = 0, middle = length / 2, end = length - 1; start <= middle; start++, end--) {Di2015NewLine            if (s.charAt(start) > ' ' || s.charAt(end) > ' ') {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8480218Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class MidnightNotifierDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Timer timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static MidnightNotifier()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        timer = new Timer(GetSleepTime());Di2015NewLine        timer.Elapsed += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OnDayChanged();Di2015NewLine            timer.Interval = GetSleepTime();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        timer.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SystemEvents.TimeChanged += OnSystemTimeChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static double GetSleepTime()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var midnightTonight = DateTime.Today.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine        var differenceInMilliseconds = (midnightTonight - DateTime.Now).TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine        return differenceInMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnDayChanged()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = DayChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine            handler(null, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnSystemTimeChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        timer.Interval = GetSleepTime();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static event EventHandler<EventArgs> DayChanged;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

SmtpService SmtpService;Di2015NewLine    private static Thread _watchThread;Di2015NewLine    private static List<Email> _emailToSend = new List<Email>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BackgroundSmtpService(SmtpService smtpService)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SmtpService = smtpService;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Send(Email email)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_emailToSend)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _emailToSend.Add(email);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine            lock (SmtpService)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_watchThread == null || !_watchThread.IsAlive)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _watchThread = new Thread(ThreadStart);Di2015NewLine                    _watchThread.Start();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ThreadStart()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lock (_emailToSend)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var emails = _emailToSend;Di2015NewLine                        _emailToSend = new List<Email>();Di2015NewLine                        emails.AsParallel().ForAll(a=>SmtpService.Send(a));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _log.Error("Error during running send emails", e);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _log.Error("Error during running send emails, outer", e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8491601Di2015UniqueSeparator//PortType enumDi2015NewLine[Flags]Di2015NewLinepublic enum PortType : intDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    write = 0x1,Di2015NewLine    read = 0x2,Di2015NewLine    redirected = 0x4,Di2015NewLine    net_attached = 0x8Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//struct for PORT_INFO_2Di2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinepublic struct PORT_INFO_2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string pPortName;Di2015NewLine    public string pMonitorName;Di2015NewLine    public string pDescription;Di2015NewLine    public PortType fPortType;Di2015NewLine    internal int Reserved;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Win32 APIDi2015NewLine[DllImport("winspool.drv", EntryPoint = "EnumPortsA", CharSet = CharSet.Ansi, SetLastError = true, ExactSpelling = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern int EnumPorts(string pName, int Level, IntPtr lpbPorts, int cbBuf, ref int pcbNeeded, ref int pcReturned);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// method for retrieving all available printer portsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>generic list populated with post names (i.e; COM1, LTP1, etc)</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic List<string> GetPortNames()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //variables needed for Win32 API callsDi2015NewLine    int result; int needed = 0; int cnt = 0; IntPtr buffer = IntPtr.Zero; IntPtr port = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //list to hold the returned port namesDi2015NewLine    List<string> ports = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //new PORT_INFO_2 for holding the portsDi2015NewLine    PORT_INFO_2[] portInfo = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //enumerate through to get the size of the memory we needDi2015NewLine    result = EnumPorts("", 2, buffer, 0, ref needed, ref cnt);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {                Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //allocate memoryDi2015NewLine        buffer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(Convert.ToInt32(needed + 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get list of port namesDi2015NewLine        result = EnumPorts("", 2, buffer, needed, ref needed, ref cnt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //check results, if 0 (zero) then we got an errorDi2015NewLine        if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //set port valueDi2015NewLine            port = buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //instantiate structDi2015NewLine            portInfo = new PORT_INFO_2[cnt];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //now loop through the returned count populating our array of PORT_INFO_2 objectsDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                portInfo[i] = (PORT_INFO_2)Marshal.PtrToStructure(port, typeof(PORT_INFO_2));Di2015NewLine                port = (IntPtr)(port.ToInt32() + Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(PORT_INFO_2)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            port = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //now get what we want. Loop through al theDi2015NewLine        //items in the PORT_INFO_2 Array and populate our generic listDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ports.Add(portInfo[i].pPortName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //sort the listDi2015NewLine        ports.Sort();Di2015NewLine        return ports;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(string.Format("Error getting available ports: {0}", ex.Message));Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(buffer);Di2015NewLine            buffer = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            port = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8497053Di2015UniqueSeparator        MyRecordCollection cAllRecords;Di2015NewLine        MyRecordCollection cParentRecords = new MyRecordCollection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This is a method that just loads the recordsDi2015NewLine        cAllRecords = LoadAllRecords();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cycle through each of the recordsDi2015NewLine        foreach (MyRecord oRecord in cAllRecords.Values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (oRecord.Id == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If the record is a parent record, add it to the list of parentsDi2015NewLine                cParentRecords.Add(oRecord.Id, oRecord);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Otherwise, add the current record to its parent's list of childrenDi2015NewLine                cAllRecords[oRecord.ParentId].Children.Add(oRecord.Id, oRecord);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AddNodesToTree(cParentRecords, this.treeView1.Nodes);Di2015NewLine
8497053Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A recursive method to add all of the records to the specified collection of nodesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cRecords"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cNodes"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void AddNodesToTree(MyRecordCollection cRecords, TreeNodeCollection cNodes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (MyRecord oRecord in cRecords.Values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode oNode = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine            oNode.Text = oRecord.Name;Di2015NewLine            oNode.Tag = oRecord;Di2015NewLine            cNodes.Add(oNode);Di2015NewLine            // Now add the node's children if anyDi2015NewLine            if (oRecord.Children.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddNodesToTree(oRecord.Children, oNode.Nodes);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8499373Di2015UniqueSeparator        string[] asLines;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ToDo: Add code here to populate the collection of lines to processDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a base element that makes popuplation of the elements easierDi2015NewLine        Element BaseElement = new Element("");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cycle through each of the linesDi2015NewLine        foreach (string sLine in asLines())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the components out of the lineDi2015NewLine            string[] asElements = sLine.Split("|");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Starting with the base elementDi2015NewLine            Element oParentElement = BaseElement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Cycle through each of the elements that were found, adding the current value to the parent's Di2015NewLine            // collection of children, then using the new or found item as the parent for the next item in the listDi2015NewLine            for (int nI = 0; nI < asElements.Length; nI++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                oParentElement = oParentElement.AddOrFetchChild(asElements[nI]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Finally, add the nodes to the tree recursivelyDi2015NewLine        AddNodesToTree(BaseElement.Children, this.treeView1.Nodes);Di2015NewLine
8499373Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A recursive method to add all of the records to the specified collection of nodesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cRecords"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cNodes"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void AddNodesToTree(ElementCollection cRecords, TreeNodeCollection cNodes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Element oRecord in cRecords.Values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode oNode = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine            oNode.Text = oRecord.Name;Di2015NewLine            oNode.Tag = oRecord;Di2015NewLine            cNodes.Add(oNode);Di2015NewLine            // Now add the node's children if anyDi2015NewLine            if (oRecord.Children.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddNodesToTree(oRecord.Children, oNode.Nodes);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8502728Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class KvpSLSEq : IEqualityComparer<KeyValuePair<string, List<string>>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public bool Equals(KeyValuePair<string, List<string>> x, KeyValuePair<string, List<string>> y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return x.Key == y.Key && x.Value.Count == y.Value.Count && x.Value.SequenceEquals(y.Value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public int GetHashCode(KeyValuePair<string, List<string>> obj)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //you could just throw NotImplementedException unless you'll reuse this elsewhere.Di2015NewLine    int hash = obj.Key.GetHashCode;Di2015NewLine    foreach(string val in obj.Value)Di2015NewLine       hash = hash * 31 + (val == null ? 0 : val.GetHashCode());Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8503751Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static double Calculate(double x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  uncheckedDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    uint h = (uint)x.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    h += (h << 15) ^ 0xffffcd7d;Di2015NewLine    h ^= (h >> 10);Di2015NewLine    h += (h << 3);Di2015NewLine    h ^= (h >> 6);Di2015NewLine    h += (h << 2) + (h << 14);Di2015NewLine    return (h ^ (h >> 16)) / (double)uint.MaxValue * x;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8503751Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static unsafe int GetSeedInteger(double d)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if(d == 0.0)Di2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine  long num = *((long*)&d);Di2015NewLine  return ((int)num) ^ (int)(num >> 32);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8504226Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Mail : IXmlSerializableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Subject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema GetSchema()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isEmpty = reader.IsEmptyElement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        reader.ReadStartElement();  Di2015NewLine        if (isEmpty) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        isEmpty = reader.IsEmptyElement;Di2015NewLine        reader.ReadStartElement();Di2015NewLine        if (isEmpty)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            reader.ReadEndElement();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Subject = reader.ReadString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        reader.ReadEndElement();Di2015NewLine        reader.ReadEndElement();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartElement("MailSubject");Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteElementString("Subject", Subject);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8504385Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets a first different char occurence indexDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="a">First string</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="b">Second string</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="handleLengthDifference">Di2015NewLine/// If true will return index of first occurence even strings are of different lengthDi2015NewLine/// and same-length parts are equals otherwise -1Di2015NewLine/// </param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Di2015NewLine/// Returns first difference index or -1 if no difference is foundDi2015NewLine/// </returns>Di2015NewLinepublic int GetFirstBreakIndex(string a, string b, bool handleLengthDifference)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int equalsReturnCode = -1;Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(a) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(b))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return handleLengthDifference ? 0 : equalsReturnCode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string longest = b.Length > a.Length ? b : a;Di2015NewLine    string shorten = b.Length > a.Length ? a : b;    Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < shorten.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (shorten[i] != longest[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Handles cases when length is different (a="1234", b="123")Di2015NewLine    // index=3 would be returned for this caseDi2015NewLine    // If you do not need such behaviour - just remove thisDi2015NewLine    if (handleLengthDifference && a.Length != b.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return shorten.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return equalsReturnCode;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8506768Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Management.Automation;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands;Di2015NewLinenamespace PSQuickStartDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Cmdlet(VerbsCommon.Get, Noun,Di2015NewLine        DefaultParameterSetName = ParmamSetPath,Di2015NewLine        SupportsShouldProcess = true)Di2015NewLine    ]Di2015NewLine    public class GetFileMetadataCommand : PSCmdletDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const string Noun = "FileMetadata";Di2015NewLine        private const string ParamSetLiteral = "Literal";Di2015NewLine        private const string ParmamSetPath = "Path";Di2015NewLine        private string[] _paths;Di2015NewLine        private bool _shouldExpandWildcards;Di2015NewLine        [Parameter(Di2015NewLine            Position = 0,Di2015NewLine            Mandatory = true,Di2015NewLine            ValueFromPipeline = false,Di2015NewLine            ValueFromPipelineByPropertyName = true,Di2015NewLine            ParameterSetName = ParamSetLiteral)Di2015NewLine        ]Di2015NewLine        [Alias("PSPath")]Di2015NewLine        [ValidateNotNullOrEmpty]Di2015NewLine        public string[] LiteralPathDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _paths; }Di2015NewLine            set { _paths = value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        [Parameter(Di2015NewLine            Position = 0,Di2015NewLine            Mandatory = true,Di2015NewLine            ValueFromPipeline = true,Di2015NewLine            ValueFromPipelineByPropertyName = true,Di2015NewLine            ParameterSetName = ParmamSetPath)Di2015NewLine        ]Di2015NewLine        [ValidateNotNullOrEmpty]Di2015NewLine        public string[] PathDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _paths; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _shouldExpandWildcards = true;Di2015NewLine                _paths = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected override void ProcessRecord()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string path in _paths)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This will hold information about the provider containingDi2015NewLine                // the items that this path string might resolve to.                Di2015NewLine                ProviderInfo provider;Di2015NewLine                // This will be used by the method that processes literal pathsDi2015NewLine                PSDriveInfo drive;Di2015NewLine                // this contains the paths to process for this iteration of theDi2015NewLine                // loop to resolve and optionally expand wildcards.Di2015NewLine                List<string> filePaths = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine                if (_shouldExpandWildcards)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Turn *.txt into foo.txt,foo2.txt etc.Di2015NewLine                    // if path is just "foo.txt," it will return unchanged.Di2015NewLine                    filePaths.AddRange(this.GetResolvedProviderPathFromPSPath(path, out provider));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // no wildcards, so don't try to expand any * or ? symbols.                    Di2015NewLine                    filePaths.Add(this.SessionState.Path.GetUnresolvedProviderPathFromPSPath(Di2015NewLine                        path, out provider, out drive));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // ensure that this path (or set of paths after wildcard expansion)Di2015NewLine                // is on the filesystem. A wildcard can never expand to span multipleDi2015NewLine                // providers.Di2015NewLine                if (IsFileSystemPath(provider, path) == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // no, so skip to next path in _paths.Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // at this point, we have a list of paths on the filesystem.Di2015NewLine                foreach (string filePath in filePaths)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PSObject custom;Di2015NewLine                    // If -whatif was supplied, do not perform the actionsDi2015NewLine                    // inside this "if" statement; only show the message.Di2015NewLine                    //Di2015NewLine                    // This block also supports the -confirm switch, whereDi2015NewLine                    // you will be asked if you want to perform the actionDi2015NewLine                    // "get metadata" on target: foo.txtDi2015NewLine                    if (ShouldProcess(filePath, "Get Metadata"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (Directory.Exists(filePath))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            custom = GetDirectoryCustomObject(new DirectoryInfo(filePath));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            custom = GetFileCustomObject(new FileInfo(filePath));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        WriteObject(custom);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private PSObject GetFileCustomObject(FileInfo file)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this message will be shown if the -verbose switch is givenDi2015NewLine            WriteVerbose("GetFileCustomObject " + file);Di2015NewLine            // create a custom object with a few propertiesDi2015NewLine            PSObject custom = new PSObject();Di2015NewLine            custom.Properties.Add(new PSNoteProperty("Size", file.Length));Di2015NewLine            custom.Properties.Add(new PSNoteProperty("Name", file.Name));Di2015NewLine            custom.Properties.Add(new PSNoteProperty("Extension", file.Extension));Di2015NewLine            return custom;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private PSObject GetDirectoryCustomObject(DirectoryInfo dir)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this message will be shown if the -verbose switch is givenDi2015NewLine            WriteVerbose("GetDirectoryCustomObject " + dir);Di2015NewLine            // create a custom object with a few propertiesDi2015NewLine            PSObject custom = new PSObject();Di2015NewLine            int files = dir.GetFiles().Length;Di2015NewLine            int subdirs = dir.GetDirectories().Length;Di2015NewLine            custom.Properties.Add(new PSNoteProperty("Files", files));Di2015NewLine            custom.Properties.Add(new PSNoteProperty("Subdirectories", subdirs));Di2015NewLine            custom.Properties.Add(new PSNoteProperty("Name", dir.Name));Di2015NewLine            return custom;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private bool IsFileSystemPath(ProviderInfo provider, string path)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool isFileSystem = true;Di2015NewLine            // check that this provider is the filesystemDi2015NewLine            if (provider.ImplementingType != typeof(FileSystemProvider))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // create a .NET exception wrapping our error textDi2015NewLine                ArgumentException ex = new ArgumentException(path +Di2015NewLine                    " does not resolve to a path on the FileSystem provider.");Di2015NewLine                // wrap this in a powershell errorrecordDi2015NewLine                ErrorRecord error = new ErrorRecord(ex, "InvalidProvider",Di2015NewLine                    ErrorCategory.InvalidArgument, path);Di2015NewLine                // write a non-terminating error to pipelineDi2015NewLine                this.WriteError(error);Di2015NewLine                // tell our caller that the item was not on the filesystemDi2015NewLine                isFileSystem = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return isFileSystem;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This method simply spits out one line at a time until it hitsDi2015NewLine        // the target cut-off.Di2015NewLine        static IEnumerable<string> ReadEntriesUntil(StreamReader stream, DateTime target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string line = stream.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (line == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (line.StartsWith("!<<"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DateTime entryDate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                yield return line;Di2015NewLine SeekToEntry(StreamReader stream, DateTime target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long from = 0;Di2015NewLine            long to = stream.BaseStream.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                long testIndex = (to - from) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                stream.BaseStream.Seek(testIndex, to))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch (entryDate.Value.CompareTo(target))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case -1:Di2015NewLine                        // Found too low...Di2015NewLine       to = testIndex;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    default: return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This is a function that is meant to keep seeking forward untilDi2015NewLine        // it hits an entry date.Di2015NewLine        static DateTime? 8509142Di2015UniqueSeparator        Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(this.currentSampleWidth, this.currentSampleHeight, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Lock the bitmap's bits.  Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height);Di2015NewLine        BitmapData bmpData = bitmap.LockBits(rect, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bitmap.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the address of the first line.Di2015NewLine        IntPtr ptr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Declare an array to hold the bytes of the bitmap (32 bits per pixel)Di2015NewLine        int pixelsCount = bitmap.Width * bitmap.Height;Di2015NewLine        int[] argbValues = new int[pixelsCount];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the RGB values into the array.Di2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(ptr, argbValues, 0, pixelsCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the color value for each pixel.Di2015NewLine        for (int counter = 0; counter < argbValues.Length; counter++)Di2015NewLine            argbValues[counter] = color.ToArgb();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the RGB values back to the bitmapDi2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(argbValues, 0, ptr, pixelsCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unlock the bits.Di2015NewLine        bitmap.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return bitmap;Di2015NewLine

8509503Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [STAThread]Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // HasDivideByZero - the result should be -1Di2015NewLine            int result1 = Calcul<DataInfo>(new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 0, C = 1 }, x => x.A / x.B + x.C);Di2015NewLine            // HasNegative - the result should be 0Di2015NewLine            int result2 = Calcul<DataInfo>(new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 5, C = -1 }, x => x.A / x.B + x.C);Di2015NewLine            // the result should be 3Di2015NewLine            int result3 = Calcul<DataInfo>(new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 5, C = 1 }, x => x.A / x.B + x.C);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static int Calcul<T>(T data, Expression<Func<T, int>> query)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (NegativeValueChecker<T>.HasNegative(data, query))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (DivideByZeroChecker<T>.HasDivideByZero(data, query))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return query.Compile().Invoke(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class DivideByZeroChecker<T> : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly T _data;Di2015NewLine        private bool _hasDivideByZero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool HasDivideByZero(T data, Expression expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var visitor = new DivideByZeroChecker<T>(data);Di2015NewLine            visitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return visitor._hasDivideByZero;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DivideByZeroChecker(T data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this._data = data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!this._hasDivideByZero && node.NodeType == ExpressionType.Divide)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var rightMemeberExpression = (MemberExpression)node.Right;Di2015NewLine                var propertyInfo = (PropertyInfo)rightMemeberExpression.Member;Di2015NewLine                var value = Convert.ToInt32(propertyInfo.GetValue(this._data, null));Di2015NewLine                this._hasDivideByZero = value == 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.VisitBinary(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class NegativeValueChecker<T> : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly T _data;Di2015NewLine        public bool _hasNegative;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool HasNegative(T data, Expression expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var visitor = new NegativeValueChecker<T>(data);Di2015NewLine            visitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return visitor._hasNegative;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public NegativeValueChecker(T data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this._data = data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!this._hasNegative)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var propertyInfo = (PropertyInfo)node.Member;Di2015NewLine                var value = Convert.ToInt32(propertyInfo.GetValue(this._data, null));Di2015NewLine                this._hasNegative = value < 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class DataInfoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int C { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8510018Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Impersonation : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private WindowsImpersonationContext _impersonatedUserContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare signatures for Win32 LogonUser and CloseHandle APIsDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("advapi32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern bool LogonUser(Di2015NewLine      string principal,Di2015NewLine      string authority,Di2015NewLine      string password,Di2015NewLine      LogonSessionType logonType,Di2015NewLine      LogonProvider logonProvider,Di2015NewLine      out IntPtr token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern bool CloseHandle(IntPtr handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("advapi32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern int DuplicateToken(IntPtr hToken,Di2015NewLine        int impersonationLevel,Di2015NewLine        ref IntPtr hNewToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("advapi32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern bool RevertToSelf();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ReSharper disable UnusedMember.LocalDi2015NewLine    enum LogonSessionType : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Interactive = 2,Di2015NewLine        Network,Di2015NewLine        Batch,Di2015NewLine        Service,Di2015NewLine        NetworkCleartext = 8,Di2015NewLine        NewCredentialsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // ReSharper disable InconsistentNamingDi2015NewLine    enum LogonProvider : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Default = 0, // default for platform (use this!)Di2015NewLine        WinNT35,     // sends smoke signals to authorityDi2015NewLine        WinNT40,     // uses NTLMDi2015NewLine        WinNT50      // negotiates Kerb or NTLMDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // ReSharper restore InconsistentNamingDi2015NewLine    // ReSharper restore UnusedMember.LocalDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Class to allow running a segment of code under a given user login contextDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="user">domain\\user</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="password">user's domain password</param>Di2015NewLine    public Impersonation(string user, string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var token = ValidateParametersAndGetFirstLoginToken(user, password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var duplicateToken = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (DuplicateToken(token, 2, ref duplicateToken) == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("DuplicateToken call to reset permissions for this token failed");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var identityForLoggedOnUser = new WindowsIdentity(duplicateToken);Di2015NewLine            _impersonatedUserContext = identityForLoggedOnUser.Impersonate();Di2015NewLine            if (_impersonatedUserContext == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("WindowsIdentity.Impersonate() failed");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (token != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                CloseHandle(token);Di2015NewLine            if (duplicateToken != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                CloseHandle(duplicateToken);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IntPtr ValidateParametersAndGetFirstLoginToken(string user, string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(user))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ConfigurationErrorsException("No user passed into impersonation class");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var userHaves = user.Split('\\\\');Di2015NewLine        if (userHaves.Length != 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ConfigurationErrorsException("User must be formatted as follows: domain\\\\user");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!RevertToSelf())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("RevertToSelf call to remove any prior impersonations failed");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = LogonUser(userHaves[1], userHaves[0],Di2015NewLine                               password,Di2015NewLine                               LogonSessionType.Interactive,Di2015NewLine                               LogonProvider.Default,Di2015NewLine                               out token);Di2015NewLine        if (!result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ConfigurationErrorsException("Logon for user " + user + " failed.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return token;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Stop impersonation and revert to the process identityDi2015NewLine        if (_impersonatedUserContext != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _impersonatedUserContext.Undo();Di2015NewLine            _impersonatedUserContext = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8510141Di2015UniqueSeparator//Code for this Class downloaded from http://implicitoperator.com/blog/2010/4/11/graphviz-c-sample.htmlDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class GraphVizDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public const string LIB_GVC = "gvc.dll";Di2015NewLine    public const string LIB_GRAPH = "graph.dll";Di2015NewLine    public const int SUCCESS = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a new Graphviz context. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(LIB_GVC)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern IntPtr gvContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Reads a graph from a string. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(LIB_GRAPH)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern IntPtr agmemread(string data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Renders a graph in memory. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(LIB_GVC)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int gvRenderData(IntPtr gvc, IntPtr g,Di2015NewLine        string format, out IntPtr result, out int length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Applies a layout to a graph using the given engine. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(LIB_GVC)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int gvLayout(IntPtr gvc, IntPtr g, string engine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Releases the resources used by a layout. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(LIB_GVC)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int gvFreeLayout(IntPtr gvc, IntPtr g);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Releases a context's resources. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(LIB_GVC)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int gvFreeContext(IntPtr gvc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary> Di2015NewLine    /// Releases the resources used by a graph. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary> Di2015NewLine    [DllImport(LIB_GRAPH)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern void agclose(IntPtr g);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Image RenderImage(string source, string layout, string format)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a Graphviz context Di2015NewLine        IntPtr gvc = gvContext();Di2015NewLine        if (gvc == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Failed to create Graphviz context.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Load the DOT data into a graph Di2015NewLine        IntPtr g = agmemread(source);Di2015NewLine        if (g == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Failed to create graph from source. Check for syntax errors.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Apply a layout Di2015NewLine        if (gvLayout(gvc, g, layout) != SUCCESS)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Layout failed.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr result;Di2015NewLine        int length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Render the graph Di2015NewLine        if (gvRenderData(gvc, g, format, out result, out length) != SUCCESS)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Render failed.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create an array to hold the rendered graphDi2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = new byte[length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy the image from the IntPtr Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(result, bytes, 0, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Free up the resources Di2015NewLine        gvFreeLayout(gvc, g);Di2015NewLine        agclose(g);Di2015NewLine        gvFreeContext(gvc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream(bytes))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Image.FromStream(stream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8511869Di2015UniqueSeparatorToString()
8511869Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring ExtractNumericCharacters(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<char> numericChars = s.Where(char.IsDigit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // numericChars is a Linq iterator; if you call ToString() on this object, you'll get the type name.Di2015NewLine    // there's no string constructor or StringBuilder Append overload that takes an IEnumerable<char>Di2015NewLine    // so we need to get a char[].  The ToArray() method iterates over the WhereEnumerator, copyingDi2015NewLine    // the sequence into a new array; this is functionally equivalent to using a foreach loop with an if statement.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char[] numericCharArray = numericChars.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now we can make a string!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new string(numericCharArray);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8511869Di2015UniqueSeparatorchar[]
8511869Di2015UniqueSeparatornew string(...
8511869Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring ExtractNumericCharacters(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new string((from c in s where char.IsDigit(c) select c).ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8517684Di2015UniqueSeparatorSymbol  means...                                       if multiline mode is...Di2015NewLine------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine^       Start of string                                off (default*)   Di2015NewLine^       Start of current line                          on               Di2015NewLine\\A      Start of string                                irrelevant       Di2015NewLine$       End of string, before final newline, if any    off              Di2015NewLine$       End of current line, before newline, if any    on               Di2015NewLine\\Z      End of string, before final newline, if any    irrelevant       Di2015NewLine\\z      End of string                                  irrelevant       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine*: In Ruby, multiline mode is always on. Use \\A or \\Z to get ^ or $ behavior.Di2015NewLine

= webRequest;Di2015NewLine        Callback = callback;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal HttpWebRequest WebRequest { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    internal Action<T> Callback { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Class1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Uri _url;Di2015NewLine    private string _action;Di2015NewLine    private string _postData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void PostMethodResponse(Action<string> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest myRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(_url);Di2015NewLine            myRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            myRequest.Headers["SOAPAction"] = _action;Di2015NewLine            myRequest.ContentType = "text/xml; charset=utf-8";Di2015NewLine            myRequest.Accept = "text/xml";Di2015NewLine            myRequest.BeginGetRequestStream(GetRequestStreamCallback, new HttpRequest<string>(myRequest, callback));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // log blahDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetRequestStreamCallback(IAsyncResult asynchronousResult)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpRequest<string> request = (HttpRequest<string>)asynchronousResult.AsyncState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.IO.Stream postStream = request.WebRequest.EndGetRequestStream(asynchronousResult);Di2015NewLine            byte[] byteArray = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(_postData);Di2015NewLine            postStream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine            postStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            // Start the asynchronous operation to get the responseDi2015NewLine            request.WebRequest.BeginGetResponse(GetResponseCallback, request);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // nothing to see, move alongDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetResponseCallback(IAsyncResult asynchronousResult)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpRequest<string> request = (HttpRequest<string>)asynchronousResult.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.WebRequest.EndGetResponse(asynchronousResult);Di2015NewLine            Stream streamResponse = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine            if (streamResponse != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StreamReader streamRead = new StreamReader(streamResponse);Di2015NewLine                string responseString = streamRead.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                // Close the stream objectDi2015NewLine                streamResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine                streamRead.Close();Di2015NewLine                // Release the HttpWebResponseDi2015NewLine                response.Close();Di2015NewLine                request.Callback(responseString);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8523824Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] StructureToByteArray(Position[] posArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (posArray == null || posArray.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new byte[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lenOfObject = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(Position));Di2015NewLine    var len = lenOfObject * posArray.Length;Di2015NewLine    var arr = new byte[len];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var handle = GCHandle.Alloc(posArray, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ptr = handle.AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(ptr, arr, 0, len);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        handle.Free();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return arr;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8524414Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main2(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine  const string stackOverflowUrl = @"http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8520488/some-delay-processing-message-in-messageinterceptor";Di2015NewLine  string empty = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine  StreamReader key = new StreamReader(@"\\Windows\\conf.txt");Di2015NewLine  string data = key.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine  string[] lines = data.Split(new char[] { '\\n' });Di2015NewLine  string keyword = lines[1].Replace(" ", empty);Di2015NewLine  string applicationID = "trackingApplication";Di2015NewLine  using (MessageInterceptor smsInterceptor = new MessageInterceptor(applicationID, false)) {Di2015NewLine    smsInterceptor.MessageReceived -= MessageInterceptorEventHandler;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Intercept_MessageReceived(object sender, command[1];Di2015NewLine    if (line == "helo") {Di2015NewLine      /*do some Stuff*/Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

} }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public class Statement {Di2015NewLine    public string FieldName, FieldValue;Di2015NewLine    public static List<Statement> GetStatements() {Di2015NewLine      List<Statement> s = new List<Statement>();Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {s.Add(new Statement());}Di2015NewLine      return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8525842Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar refs = GetReferencesFromDB();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Using Parallel::ForEach here will partition and process your data on separate worker = new byte[1048576];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Need to use FileStream API directly so we can enable async I/ODi2015NewLine    FileStream sourceFileStream = new FileStream(Di2015NewLine                                      filePath, Di2015NewLine                                      FileMode.Open,Di2015NewLine                                      FileAccess.Read,Di2015NewLine                                      FileShare.Read,Di2015NewLine                                      8192,Di2015NewLine                                      true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use FromAsync to sourceFileStream.BeginReadDi2015NewLine                                             sourceFileStream.EndReadDi2015NewLine                                             fileDataBuffer,Di2015NewLine                                             fileDataBuffer.Length,Di2015NewLine                                             null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add a continuation that will fire when the async read is completedDi2015NewLine    readSourceFileStreamTask.ContinueWith(readSourceFileStreamAntecedent =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int soureFileStreamBytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Determine exactly how many bytes were read Di2015NewLine            // NOTE: this will propagate any potential exception that may have occurred in EndReadDi2015NewLine            sourceFileStreamBytesRead = readSourceFileStreamAntecedent.Result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Always clean up the source streamDi2015NewLine            sourceFileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            sourceFileStream = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This is here to make sure you don't end up trying to read files larger than this sample code can handleDi2015NewLine        if(sourceFileStreamBytesRead == fileDataBuffer.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException("You need to implement reading files larger than 1MB. :P");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the file data to a stringDi2015NewLine        string html = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(fileDataBuffer, 0, you don't end up trying to write files larger than this sample code can handleDi2015NewLine        if(Encoding.UTF8.GetByteCount > fileDataBuffer.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException("You need to implement writing files larger than 1MB. :P");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the file data back to bytes for writingDi2015NewLine        Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(convertedHtml, 0, convertedHtml.Length, fileDataBuffer, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Need to use FileStream API directly so we can enable                    FileMode.OpenOrCreate,Di2015NewLine                                               FileAccess.Write,Di2015NewLine                                               FileShare.None,Di2015NewLine                                               8192,Di2015NewLine                                               true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use FromAsync to read the data from the fileDi2015NewLine        Task destinationFileStreamWriteTask = Task.Factory.FromAsync(Di2015NewLine                                                  destinationFileStream.BeginWrite,Di2015NewLine                                                  destinationFileStream.EndWrite,Di2015NewLine                                                  fileDataBuffer,Di2015NewLine                                                  0,Di2015NewLine                                                  fileDataBuffer.Length,Di2015NewLine                                                  null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add a continuation that will fire when the async write is completedDi2015NewLine        destinationFileStreamWriteTask.ContinueWith(destinationFileStreamWriteAntecedent =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // NOTE: we call wait here to observe any potential exceptions that might have occurred in EndWriteDi2015NewLine                destinationFileStreamWriteAntecedent.Wait();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Always close the destination file streamDi2015NewLine                destinationFileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                destinationFileStream = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        },Di2015NewLine        TaskContinuationOptions.AttachedToParent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Send to external 8525972Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace PasswordSampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Generated password: {0}", GeneratePassword(12, true));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Generate a random passwordDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="pwdLenght">Password lenght</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="nonAlphaNumericChars">Indicates if password will include non alpha-numeric</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Return a password</returns>Di2015NewLine        private static String GeneratePassword(int pwdLenght, bool nonAlphaNumericChars)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Allowed charactersDi2015NewLine            String allowedChars = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (nonAlphaNumericChars)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Add non-alphanumeric charsDi2015NewLine                allowedChars += "-&@#%!*$?_";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            char[] passwordChars = new char[pwdLenght];Di2015NewLine            Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Generate a random passwordDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < pwdLenght; i++)Di2015NewLine                passwordChars[i] = allowedChars[rnd.Next(0, allowedChars.Length)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new String(passwordChars);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8526386Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class SurfaceCalculatorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ValueXyz[] _valuesXyz;Di2015NewLine    private double _surface;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _textWithValues;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SurfaceCalculator(string textWithValues)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _textWithValues = textWithValues;Di2015NewLine        SetValuesToCalculate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double SurfaceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _surface; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void CalculateSurface()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < _valuesXyz.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_valuesXyz[i].Z == 0)Di2015NewLine                _surface = (_valuesXyz[i].X*_valuesXyz[i + 1].Y) - (_valuesXyz[i + 1].X*_valuesXyz[i].Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetValuesToCalculate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var valuesXyz = _textWithValues.Split(' '); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _valuesXyz = valuesXyz.Select(item => new ValueXyzDi2015NewLine                                                  {Di2015NewLine                                                      X = Convert.ToDouble(item.Split(',')[0]),Di2015NewLine                                                      Y = Convert.ToDouble(item.Split(',')[1]),Di2015NewLine                                                      Z = Convert.ToInt32(item.Split(',')[2])Di2015NewLine                                                  }).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

private IntPtr hWndTarget = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    private IntPtr oldWndProc = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    private WndProcDelegate newWndProc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private FocusFormWrapper()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FocusFormWrapper(Form sourceForm)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sourceForm == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("sourceForm");Di2015NewLine        if (!IsWindow(sourceForm.Handle))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("sourceForm IsWindow failed");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        myForm = sourceForm;Di2015NewLine        hWndTarget = myForm.Handle;Di2015NewLine        AddSubclass();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ~FocusFormWrapper()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RemoveSubclass();Di2015NewLine        myForm = null;Di2015NewLine        newWndProc = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine = new WndProcDelegate(NewWndProc);Di2015NewLine            oldWndProc = GetWindowLong(hWndTarget, GWL_WNDPROC);Di2015NewLine            result = SetWindowLong(hWndTarget, GWL_WNDPROC, {Di2015NewLine        int result = -1;Di2015NewLine        if (myForm != null && newWndProc != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = SetWindowLong(hWndTarget, GWL_WNDPROC, oldWndProc);Di2015NewLine            newWndProc = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IntPtr NewWndProc(IntPtr hWnd, uint msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (msg == WM_PARENTNOTIFY && !myForm.Focused)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Make this form auto-grab the focus when menu/controls are clicked Di2015NewLine                myForm.Activate();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (msg == WM_CLOSE)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RemoveSubclass();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return CallWindowProc(oldWndProc, hWnd, msg, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8530739Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(List<T> l_oItems)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable oReturn = new DataTable(typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine        object[] a_oValues;Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //#### Collect the a_oProperties for the passed TDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] a_oProperties = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //#### Traverse each oProperty, .Add'ing each .Name/.BaseType into our oReturn valueDi2015NewLine        //####     NOTE: The call to .BaseType is required as DataTables/DataSets do not support nullable types, so it's non-nullable counterpart Type is required in the .Column definitionDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo oProperty in a_oProperties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oReturn.Columns.Add(oProperty.Name, BaseType(oProperty.PropertyType));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //#### Traverse the l_oItemsDi2015NewLine        foreach (T oItem in l_oItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //#### Collect the a_oValues for this loopDi2015NewLine            a_oValues = new object[a_oProperties.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //#### Traverse the a_oProperties, populating each a_oValues as we goDi2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < a_oProperties.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                a_oValues[i] = a_oProperties[i].GetValue(oItem, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //#### .Add the .Row that represents the current a_oValues into our oReturn valueDi2015NewLine            oReturn.Rows.Add(a_oValues);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //#### Return the above determined oReturn value to the callerDi2015NewLine        return oReturn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Type BaseType(Type oType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //#### If the passed oType is valid, .IsValueType and is logicially nullable, .Get(its)UnderlyingTypeDi2015NewLine        if (oType != null && oType.IsValueType &&Di2015NewLine            oType.IsGenericType && oType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>)Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(oType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //#### Else the passed oType was null or was not logicially nullable, so simply return the passed oTypeDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return oType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8530739Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToCSV(DataTable dataTable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //create the stringbuilder that would hold the dataDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        //check if there are columns in the datatableDi2015NewLine        if (dataTable.Columns.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //loop thru each of the columns for headersDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn column in dataTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //append the column name followed by the separatorDi2015NewLine                sb.Append(column.ColumnName + ",");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //append a carriage returnDi2015NewLine            sb.Append("\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //loop thru each row of the datatableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow row in dataTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //loop thru each column in the datatableDi2015NewLine                foreach (DataColumn column in dataTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //get the value for the row on the specified columnDi2015NewLine                    // and append the separatorDi2015NewLine                    sb.Append("\\"" + row[column].ToString() + "\\"" + ",");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //append a carriage returnDi2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8533446Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic uint str2ip(string ip)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] numbers = ip.Split('.');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    uint x1 = (uint)(Convert.ToByte(numbers[0]) << 24);Di2015NewLine    uint x2 = (uint)(Convert.ToByte(numbers[1]) << 16);Di2015NewLine    uint x3 = (uint)(Convert.ToByte(numbers[2]) << 8);Di2015NewLine    uint x4 = (uint)(Convert.ToByte(numbers[3]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return x1 + x2 + x3 + x4;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineandDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string ip2str(uint ip)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string s1 = ((ip & 0xff000000) >> 24).ToString() + "."; Di2015NewLine    string s2 = ((ip & 0x00ff0000) >> 16).ToString() + ".";Di2015NewLine    string s3 = ((ip & 0x0000ff00) >> 8).ToString() + "."; Di2015NewLine    string s4 = (ip & 0x000000ff).ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string ip2 = s1 + s2 + s3 + s4;Di2015NewLine    return ip2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8538687Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void TakesDog(Dog theDog) { ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void TakesBulldog(Bulldog theBulldog) { ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void TakesObject(object theObject) { ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Given these declarations...Di2015NewLine    object dog = new BullDog();Di2015NewLine    Dog dog2 = new BullDog();Di2015NewLine    BullDog dog3 = new BullDog();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //These calls will work because a BullDog is a Dog:Di2015NewLine    TakesDog(dog2);Di2015NewLine    TakesDog(dog3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this call will work because a Bulldog is a Bulldog:Di2015NewLine    TakesBulldog(dog3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //and these calls will ALL work because all Dogs are Objects:Di2015NewLine    TakesObject(dog);Di2015NewLine    TakesObject(dog2);Di2015NewLine    TakesObject(dog3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //However, these calls will fail because an Object or Dog is not Di2015NewLine    //necessarily a Bulldog,Di2015NewLine    //EVEN THOUGH our current dog and dog2 are indeed references to Bulldogs:Di2015NewLine    TakesBulldog(dog);        Di2015NewLine    TakesBulldog(dog2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //An explicit conversion is necessary to make the above calls work:Di2015NewLine    TakesBulldog(dog2 as Bulldog); //works given the current referenceDi2015NewLine    TakesBulldog((Bulldog)dog2); //works given the current referenceDi2015NewLine    TakesBulldog(dog as Bulldog); //dittoDi2015NewLine    TakesBulldog((Bulldog)dog); //dittoDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //but if we change the value of dog2 to some other dog:Di2015NewLine    dog2 = new Labrador();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the above calls now fail:Di2015NewLine    TakesBulldog(dog2 as Bulldog); //passes null into the methodDi2015NewLine    TakesBulldog((Bulldog)dog2); //throws InvalidCastExceptionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //you can avoid problems by checking the true type:Di2015NewLine    if(dog2 is Bulldog) //interrogates the type of the referenced objectDi2015NewLine       TakesBulldog((Bulldog)dog2); //worksDi2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine       TakesDog(dog2); //general fallback caseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Object is similar but even more basic:Di2015NewLine    dog = "I'm a dog"; //now dog is a System.StringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this call still works:Di2015NewLine    TakesObject(dog);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //but these will fail:Di2015NewLine    TakesDog(dog);Di2015NewLine    TakesBulldog(dog);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8538687Di2015UniqueSeparator//given these declarations:Di2015NewLineobject dog = new BullDog();Di2015NewLineBullDog dog2 = new BullDog();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//even though dog is a BullDog, attempting to call BullDog-specific Di2015NewLine//members (methods, properties, fields) will fail:Di2015NewLinedog.Drool();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//you may only call members as specific as the object type of the Di2015NewLine//variable holding the reference:Di2015NewLinedog.ToString(); //defined by Object. If you've overridden it in Dog or BullDog,Di2015NewLine   //you'll get that implementationDi2015NewLinedog2.Drool(); //works because we know from the variable that dog2 is a BullDog.Di2015NewLine

           .Where(e => e.IsRelationship))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var entry = GetEntityEntryFromRelation(relationEntry, 0);Di2015NewLine            // Find representation of the              .First(r => r.RelationshipSet == relationEntry.EntitySet);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RelationshipType relationshipType = relatedEnd.RelationshipSet.ElementType;Di2015NewLine            if (!SkipDeletion(relationshipType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Now we know that model is inconsistent and entity on many side must be deletedDi2015NewLine            relationshipType.RelationshipEndMembers.Any(Di2015NewLine                r => r.RelationshipMultiplicity == RelationshipMultiplicity.ZeroOrOne);Di2015NewLine
