8547574Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void SetFieldValue(object oRecord, string sName, object oValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo theProperty = null;Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo theField = null;Di2015NewLine        System.Type oType = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oType = oRecord.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // See if the column is a property in the recordDi2015NewLine            theProperty = oType.GetProperty(sName, BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public, null, null, new Type[0], null);Di2015NewLine            if (theProperty == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                theField = oType.GetField(sName, BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLine                if (theField != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    theField.SetValue(oRecord, Global.ValueFromDB(oValue, theField.FieldType.Name));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object[] aAttributes = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // See if the class type is decorated with the NoUDFs attribute. If so, do not add the attribute.Di2015NewLine                    aAttributes = oType.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(NoUDFsAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine                    if (aAttributes.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Otherwise, anything that is not found as a property or a field will be stored as a UDFDi2015NewLine                        oRecord.SetUDFValue(sName, oValue);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (theProperty.CanWrite)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    theProperty.SetValue(oRecord, Global.ValueFromDB(oValue, theProperty.PropertyType.Name), null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception theException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Handle the exceptionDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8547574Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string GetFieldValueForSQL(object oRecord, string sName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo theProperty = null;Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo theField = null;Di2015NewLine        System.Type oType = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oType = oRecord.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // See if the column is a property in the recordDi2015NewLine            theProperty = oType.GetProperty(sName, BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public, null, null, new Type[0], null);Di2015NewLine            if (theProperty == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                theField = oType.GetField(sName, BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLine                if (theField != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return Global.ValueForSQL(theField.GetValue(oRecord), theField.FieldType.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    UDF oUDF = null;Di2015NewLine                    object[] aAttributes = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // See if the class type is decorated with the NoUDFs attribute. If so, do not get the value.Di2015NewLine                    aAttributes = oType.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(NoUDFsAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine                    if (aAttributes.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        oUDF = oRecord.GetUDF(sName);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (oUDF != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return Global.ValueForSQL(oUDF.Value);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return "Null";Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Global.ValueForSQL(theProperty.GetValue(oRecord, null), theProperty.PropertyType.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception theException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Handle the exceptionDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8548154Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void EncryptOrDecryptFile(string strInputFile, string strOutputFile, byte[] bytKey, byte[] bytIV, CryptoAction Direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //In case of errors.Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(strInputFile))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Please select an input file name", "Missing file name", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Information);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!File.Exists(strInputFile))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show(string.Format("The selected input file {0} does not exist.", strInputFile), "Invalid Path or Filename", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Information);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(strOutputFile))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Please select an output file name", "Missing file name", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Information);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //holds a block of bytes for processingDi2015NewLine            long lngBytesProcessed = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Setup file streams to handle input and output.Di2015NewLine            using (var fsInput = new System.IO.FileStream(strInputFile, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var fsOutput = new System.IO.FileStream(strOutputFile, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Declare your CryptoServiceProvider.Di2015NewLine                    using (var cspRijndael = new System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //Setup Progress BarDi2015NewLine                            pbStatus.Value = 0;Di2015NewLine                            pbStatus.Maximum = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            cspRijndael.Key = bytKey;Di2015NewLine                            cspRijndael.IV = bytIV;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            ICryptoTransform oTransform = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Determine if ecryption or decryption and setup transform.Di2015NewLine                            switch (Direction)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                case CryptoAction.ActionEncrypt:Di2015NewLine                                    oTransform = cspRijndael.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine                                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                case CryptoAction.ActionDecrypt:Di2015NewLine                                    oTransform = cspRijndael.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine                                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                default:Di2015NewLine                                    throw new Exception("Unknown Direction");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            using (var csCryptoStream = new CryptoStream(fsOutput, oTransform, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                //Declare variables for encrypt/decrypt process.Di2015NewLine                                byte[] bytBuffer = new byte[4097];Di2015NewLine                                //running count of bytes processedDi2015NewLine                                long lngFileLength = fsInput.Length;Di2015NewLine                                //the input file's lengthDi2015NewLine                                int intBytesInCurrentBlock = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                //Use While to loop until all of the file is processed.Di2015NewLine                                while (lngBytesProcessed < lngFileLength)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    //Read file with the input filestream.Di2015NewLine                                    intBytesInCurrentBlock = fsInput.Read(bytBuffer, 0, 4096);Di2015NewLine                                    //Write output file with the cryptostream.Di2015NewLine                                    csCryptoStream.Write(bytBuffer, 0, intBytesInCurrentBlock);Di2015NewLine                                    //Update lngBytesProcessedDi2015NewLine                                    lngBytesProcessed = lngBytesProcessed + Convert.ToInt64(intBytesInCurrentBlock);Di2015NewLine                                    //Update Progress BarDi2015NewLine                                    pbStatus.Value = Convert.ToInt32((lngBytesProcessed / lngFileLength) * 100);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        finallyDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (cspRijndael != null)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                // Clear the managed objectDi2015NewLine                                cspRijndael.Clear();Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If encrypting then delete the original unencrypted file.Di2015NewLine            if (Direction == CryptoAction.ActionEncrypt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                File.Delete(strFileToEncrypt);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If decrypting then delete the encrypted file.Di2015NewLine            if (Direction == CryptoAction.ActionDecrypt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                File.Delete(strFileToDecrypt);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update the user when the file is done.Di2015NewLine            string Wrap = "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine            if (Direction == CryptoAction.ActionEncrypt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Encryption Complete" + Wrap + Wrap + "Total bytes processed = " + lngBytesProcessed.ToString(), "Done", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Information);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Update the progress bar and textboxes.Di2015NewLine                pbStatus.Value = 0;Di2015NewLine                txtFileToEncrypt.Text = "Click Browse to load file.";Di2015NewLine                txtPassEncrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                txtConPassEncrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                txtDestinationEncrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                btnChangeEncrypt.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine                btnEncrypt.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Update the user when the file is done.Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Decryption Complete" + Wrap + Wrap + "Total bytes processed = " + lngBytesProcessed.ToString(), "Done", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Information);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Update the progress bar and textboxes.Di2015NewLine                pbStatus.Value = 0;Di2015NewLine                txtFileToDecrypt.Text = "Click Browse to load file.";Di2015NewLine                txtPassDecrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                txtConPassDecrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                txtDestinationDecrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                btnChangeDecrypt.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine                btnDecrypt.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Unknown exception occurred: " + ex.Message, "Unknown Exception", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Catch all other errors. And delete partial files.Di2015NewLine            if (Direction == CryptoAction.ActionDecrypt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(txtDestinationDecrypt.Text) && (File.Exists(txtDestinationDecrypt.Text)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    File.Delete(txtDestinationDecrypt.Text);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                pbStatus.Value = 0;Di2015NewLine                txtPassDecrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                txtConPassDecrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Please check to make sure that you entered the correct password.", "Invalid Password", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Exclamation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(txtDestinationEncrypt.Text) && (File.Exists(txtDestinationEncrypt.Text)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    File.Delete(txtDestinationEncrypt.Text);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                pbStatus.Value = 0;Di2015NewLine                txtPassEncrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLine                txtConPassEncrypt.Text = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("This file cannot be encrypted.", "File Cannot Be Encrypted", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Exclamation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8554803Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal sealed class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int threadCount = 2;Di2015NewLine        using (ThreadData data = new ThreadData(threadCount))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread[] threads = new Thread[threadCount];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < threadCount; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                threads[i] = new Thread(DoOperations);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Thread thread in threads)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                thread.Start(data);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Starting...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start and wait here while all work is dispatched.Di2015NewLine            data.RunDispatcher();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Dispatcher has exited.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Shutdown.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DoOperations(object objData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThreadData data = (ThreadData)objData;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Start scheduling operations from child thread.Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int t = Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId;Di2015NewLine                int n = i;Di2015NewLine                data.ExecuteTask(() => SayHello(t, n));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Child thread is done.Di2015NewLine            data.OnThreadCompleted();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SayHello(int requestingThreadId, int operationNumber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Saying hello from thread {0} ({1}) on thread {2}.",Di2015NewLine            requestingThreadId,Di2015NewLine            operationNumber,Di2015NewLine            Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private sealed class ThreadData : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dispatcher dispatcher;Di2015NewLine        private readonly TaskScheduler scheduler;Di2015NewLine        private readonly TaskFactory factory;Di2015NewLine        private readonly CountdownEvent countdownEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // In this example, we initialize the countdown event with the total numberDi2015NewLine        // of child threads so that we know when all threads are finished schedulingDi2015NewLine        // work.Di2015NewLine        public ThreadData(int threadCount)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.dispatcher = Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher;Di2015NewLine            SynchronizationContext context = Di2015NewLine                new DispatcherSynchronizationContext(this.dispatcher);Di2015NewLine            SynchronizationContext.SetSynchronizationContext(context);Di2015NewLine            this.scheduler = TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext();Di2015NewLine            this.factory = new TaskFactory(this.scheduler);Di2015NewLine            this.countdownEvent = new CountdownEvent(threadCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This method should be called by a child thread when it wants to invokeDi2015NewLine        // an operation back on the main dispatcher thread.  This will block untilDi2015NewLine        // the method is done executing.Di2015NewLine        public void ExecuteTask(Action action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Task task = this.factory.StartNew(action);Di2015NewLine            task.Wait();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This method should be called by threads when they are doneDi2015NewLine        // scheduling work.Di2015NewLine        public void OnThreadCompleted()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool allThreadsFinished = this.countdownEvent.Signal();Di2015NewLine            if (allThreadsFinished)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.dispatcher.InvokeShutdown();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This method should be called by the main thread so that it will beginDi2015NewLine        // processing the work scheduled by child threads. It will return whenDi2015NewLine        // the dispatcher is shutdown.Di2015NewLine        public void RunDispatcher()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.Run();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine            GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Dispose all IDisposable resources.Di2015NewLine        private void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (disposing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.countdownEvent.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8559057Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static unsafe byte GetIndexedPixel(Bitmap b, int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (x < 0 || x >= b.Width) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("x", string.Format("x should be in 0-{0}", b.Width));Di2015NewLine    if (y < 0 || y >= b.Height) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("y", string.Format("y should be in 0-{0}", b.Height));Di2015NewLine    var data = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, b.Width, b.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Indexed);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var scan0 = (byte*) data.Scan0;Di2015NewLine        return scan0[x + y*data.Stride];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (data != null) b.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8563923Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<string>
8563923Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.LINQ
8563923Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring GetUniqueString(IEnumerable<string> Collection, bool OrderMatters = true, string Escape = "/", string Separator = ":")Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(Escape == Separator)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Escape character should never equal separator character because it fails in the case of empty strings");Di2015NewLine    if(!OrderMatters) Di2015NewLine        Collection = Collection.OrderBy(v=>v);//Sorting fixes ordering issues.Di2015NewLine    return CollectionDi2015NewLine        .Select(v=>v.Replace(Escape, Escape + Escape).Replace(Separator,Escape + Separator))//Escape StringDi2015NewLine        .Aggregate((a,b)=>a+Separator+b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8569751Di2015UniqueSeparatorint lead = 0, rowCount = 3, columnCount = 4;Di2015NewLine        for (int r = 0; r < rowCount; r++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (columnCount <= lead) break;Di2015NewLine            int i = r;Di2015NewLine            while (matrix[i, lead] == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine                if (i == rowCount)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    i = r;Di2015NewLine                    lead++;Di2015NewLine                    if (columnCount == lead)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        lead--;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < columnCount; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double temp = matrix[r, j];Di2015NewLine                matrix[r, j] = matrix[i, j];Di2015NewLine                matrix[i, j] = temp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            double div = matrix[r, lead];Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < columnCount; j++) matrix[r, j] /= div;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < rowCount; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (j != r)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    double sub = matrix[j, lead];Di2015NewLine                    for (int k = 0; k < columnCount; k++) matrix[j, k] -= (sub * matrix[r, k]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            lead++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

8570800Di2015UniqueSeparatorSecondsBetween
8570800Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace D2007SecondsBetweenDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      const double HoursPerDay   = 24;Di2015NewLine      const double MinsPerHour   = 60;Di2015NewLine      const double SecsPerMin    = 60;Di2015NewLine      const double MSecsPerSec   = 1000;Di2015NewLine      const double MinsPerDay    = HoursPerDay * MinsPerHour;Di2015NewLine      const double SecsPerDay    = MinsPerDay * SecsPerMin;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static double SpanOfNowAndThen(Double ANow, Double AThen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          if (ANow < AThen)Di2015NewLine            return AThen - ANow;Di2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine            return ANow - AThen;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static double SecondSpan(Double ANow, Double AThen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine         return  SecsPerDay * SpanOfNowAndThen(ANow, AThen);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static int SecondsBetween(DateTime ANow, DateTime AThen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          return (int)Math.Truncate(SecondSpan(ANow.ToOADate(), AThen.ToOADate()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TimeSpan span ;            Di2015NewLine            span = DateTime.Parse("16/02/2009 23:25:34").Subtract(DateTime.Parse("1/01/2005 00:00:00"));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(span.TotalSeconds);//returns 130289134Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(SecondsBetween(DateTime.Parse("16/02/2009 23:25:34"), DateTime.Parse("1/01/2005 00:00:00")));//returns 130289133Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            span = DateTime.Parse("16/11/2011 23:25:43").Subtract(DateTime.Parse("1/01/2005 00:00:00"));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(span.TotalSeconds);//returns 216948343Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(SecondsBetween(DateTime.Parse("16/11/2011 23:25:43"), DateTime.Parse("1/01/2005 00:00:00")));//returns 216948343Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8571388Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generate the signature base that is used to produce the signatureDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="url">The full url that needs to be signed including its non OAuth url parameters</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="consumerKey">The consumer key</param>        Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="token">The token, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="tokenSecret">The token secret, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="httpMethod">The http method used. Must be a valid HTTP method verb (POST,GET,PUT, etc)</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="signatureType">The signature type. To use the default values use <see cref="OAuthBase.SignatureTypes">OAuthBase.SignatureTypes</see>.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The signature base</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GenerateSignatureBase(Uri url, string consumerKey, string token, string tokenSecret, string httpMethod, string timeStamp, string nonce, string signatureType, SortedList<String, String> customParameters, out string normalizedUrl, out string normalizedRequestParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (token == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            token = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (tokenSecret == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tokenSecret = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(consumerKey))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("consumerKey");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(httpMethod))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("httpMethod");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(signatureType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("signatureType");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        normalizedUrl = null;Di2015NewLine        normalizedRequestParameters = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<QueryParameter> parameters = GetQueryParameters(url.Query);Di2015NewLine        parameters.Add(new QueryParameter(OAuthVersionKey, OAuthVersion));Di2015NewLine        parameters.Add(new QueryParameter(OAuthNonceKey, nonce));Di2015NewLine        parameters.Add(new QueryParameter(OAuthTimestampKey, timeStamp));Di2015NewLine        parameters.Add(new QueryParameter(OAuthSignatureMethodKey, signatureType));Di2015NewLine        parameters.Add(new QueryParameter(OAuthConsumerKeyKey, consumerKey));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (String key in customParameters.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parameters.Add(new QueryParameter(key, UrlEncode(customParameters[key])));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(token))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parameters.Add(new QueryParameter(OAuthTokenKey, token));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        parameters.Sort(new QueryParameterComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        normalizedUrl = string.Format("{0}://{1}", url.Scheme, url.Host);Di2015NewLine        if (!((url.Scheme == "http" && url.Port == 80) || (url.Scheme == "https" && url.Port == 443)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            normalizedUrl += ":" + url.Port;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        normalizedUrl += url.AbsolutePath;Di2015NewLine        normalizedRequestParameters = NormalizeRequestParameters(parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder signatureBase = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        signatureBase.AppendFormat("{0}&", httpMethod.ToUpper());Di2015NewLine        signatureBase.AppendFormat("{0}&", UrlEncode(normalizedUrl));Di2015NewLine        signatureBase.AppendFormat("{0}", UrlEncode(normalizedRequestParameters));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return signatureBase.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generate the signature value based on the given signature base and hash algorithmDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="signatureBase">The signature based as produced by the GenerateSignatureBase method or by any other means</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="hash">The hash algorithm used to perform the hashing. If the hashing algorithm requires initialization or a key it should be set prior to calling this method</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A base64 string of the hash value</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GenerateSignatureUsingHash(string signatureBase, HashAlgorithm hash)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ComputeHash(hash, signatureBase);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Helper function to compute a hash valueDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="hashAlgorithm">The hashing algoirhtm used. If that algorithm needs some initialization, like HMAC and its derivatives, they should be initialized prior to passing it to this function</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="data">The data to hash</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>a Base64 string of the hash value</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string ComputeHash(HashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm, string data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (hashAlgorithm == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("hashAlgorithm");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(data))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("data");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] dataBuffer = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLine        byte[] hashBytes = hashAlgorithm.ComputeHash(dataBuffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(hashBytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates a signature using the specified signatureType Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>      Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="url">The full url that needs to be signed including its non OAuth url parameters</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="consumerKey">The consumer key</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="consumerSecret">The consumer seceret</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="token">The token, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="tokenSecret">The token secret, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="httpMethod">The http method used. Must be a valid HTTP method verb (POST,GET,PUT, etc)</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="signatureType">The type of signature to use</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A base64 string of the hash value</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GenerateSignature(Uri url, string consumerKey, string consumerSecret, string token, string tokenSecret, string httpMethod, string timeStamp, string nonce, SignatureTypes signatureType, SortedList<String, String> parameters, out string normalizedUrl, out string normalizedRequestParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        normalizedUrl = null;Di2015NewLine        normalizedRequestParameters = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (signatureType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SignatureTypes.PLAINTEXT:Di2015NewLine                return HttpUtility.UrlEncode(string.Format("{0}&{1}", consumerSecret, tokenSecret));Di2015NewLine            case SignatureTypes.HMACSHA1:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string signatureBase = GenerateSignatureBase(url, consumerKey, token, tokenSecret, httpMethod, timeStamp, nonce, HMACSHA1SignatureType, parameters, out normalizedUrl, out normalizedRequestParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                HMACSHA1 hmacsha1 = new HMACSHA1();Di2015NewLine                hmacsha1.Key = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(string.Format("{0}&{1}", UrlEncode(consumerSecret), string.IsNullOrEmpty(tokenSecret) ? "" : UrlEncode(tokenSecret)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return GenerateSignatureUsingHash(signatureBase, hmacsha1);Di2015NewLine            case SignatureTypes.RSASHA1:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Unknown signature type", "signatureType");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8571727Di2015UniqueSeparator// deliberately made hard to optimise without whole program optimisationDi2015NewLinepublic static int[] data = new int[1000000]; // long[] when testing longDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I happened to have a winforms app open, feel free to make this a console app..Di2015NewLineprivate void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long best = long.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < 1000; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch timer = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        int a1 = ~0, b1 = 0x55555555, c1 = 0x12345678; // varies: see belowDi2015NewLine        int a2 = ~0, b2 = 0x55555555, c2 = 0x12345678;Di2015NewLine        int[] d = data; // long[] when testing longDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < d.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int v = d[i]; // long when testing long, see belowDi2015NewLine            a1 &= v; a2 &= v;Di2015NewLine            b1 &= v; b2 &= v;Di2015NewLine            c1 &= v; c2 &= v;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // don't average times: we want the result with minimal context switchingDi2015NewLine        best = Math.Min(best, timer.ElapsedTicks); Di2015NewLine        button1.Text = best.ToString() + ":" + (a1 + a2 + b1 + b2 + c1 + c2).ToString("X8");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8574425Di2015UniqueSeparator      // Following line gives error, as it should do, because the .NET types Di2015NewLine      // MyClient.IService and MySpace.Service are not related.   Di2015NewLine      MyClient.IService iservice = (MyClient.IService)new MySpace.Service();   // ERROR !!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Likewise, a WCF client proxy defined using MyService.IService as the contractDi2015NewLine      // cannot be cast to the unrelated .NET type MyClient.IServiceDi2015NewLine      ChannelFactory<MyService.IService> fac1 = new ChannelFactory<MyService.IService>(binding); Di2015NewLine      fac1.Open(); Di2015NewLine      MyClient.IService proxy = (MyClient.IService)fac1.CreateChannel(new EndpointAddress(Url));  // ERROR !!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // but the service can be consumed by any WCF client proxy for which the contract Di2015NewLine      // matches the defined service contract (i.e. they both expect the same XML infoset Di2015NewLine      // in the request and response messages). There is no dependency between the .NET type Di2015NewLine      // used in the client code and the .NET type used to implement the service. Di2015NewLine      ChannelFactory<MyClient.IService> fac = new ChannelFactory<MyClient.IService>(binding); Di2015NewLine      fac.Open(); Di2015NewLine      // Next line does not error because the ChannelFactory instance is explicitly Di2015NewLine      // specialised to return a MyClient.IService so the .NET type is the same... there is no castDi2015NewLine      MyClient.IService proxy = fac.CreateChannel(new EndpointAddress(Url)); Di2015NewLine      // NOTE: Thus far we have not done anything with the service in this case.Di2015NewLine      // If we call Method() it should succeed, since the contract matches. If we callDi2015NewLine      // Method2() the channel will fault as there is no matching operation contract in the service.Di2015NewLine

8578118Di2015UniqueSeparator    Private Function StripWhitespace(ByVal body As String) As StringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        body = body.Replace("  ", " ")Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace(Environment.NewLine, [String].Empty)Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace(vbTab, String.Empty)Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace(" {", "{")Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace(" :", ":")Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace(": ", ":")Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace(", ", ",")Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace("; ", ";")Di2015NewLine        body = body.Replace(";}", "}")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ' sometimes found when retrieving CSS remotelyDi2015NewLine        body = body.Replace("?", String.Empty)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'body = Regex.Replace(body, @"/\\*[^\\*]*\\*+([^/\\*]*\\*+)*/", "$1");Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "(?<=[>])\\s{2,}(?=[<])|(?<=[>])\\s{2,}(?=)|(?<=&ndsp;)\\s{2,}(?=[<])", [String].Empty)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'Remove comments from CSSDi2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "/\\*[\\d\\D]*?\\*/", String.Empty)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Return bodyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine
8578118Di2015UniqueSeparator    Private Function StripWhitespace(ByVal body As String) As StringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dim lines As String() = body.Split(New String() {Environment.NewLine}, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries)Di2015NewLine        Dim emptyLines As New StringBuilder()Di2015NewLine        For Each line As String In linesDi2015NewLine            Dim s As String = line.Trim()Di2015NewLine            If s.Length > 0 AndAlso Not s.StartsWith("//") ThenDi2015NewLine                emptyLines.AppendLine(s.Trim())Di2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        body = emptyLines.ToString()Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "^[\\s]+|[ \\f\\r\\t\\v]+$", [String].Empty)Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "([+-])\\n\\1", "$1 $1")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "([^+-][+-])\\n", "$1")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "([^+]) ?(\\+)", "$1$2")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "(\\+) ?([^+])", "$1$2")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "([^-]) ?(\\-)", "$1$2")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "(\\-) ?([^-])", "$1$2")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "\\n([{}()[\\],<>/*%&|^!~?:=.;+-])", "$1")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "(\\W(if|while|for)\\([^{]*?\\))\\n", "$1")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "(\\W(if|while|for)\\([^{]*?\\))((if|while|for)\\([^{]*?\\))\\n", "$1$3")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "([;}]else)\\n", "$1 ")Di2015NewLine        body = Regex.Replace(body, "(?<=[>])\\s{2,}(?=[<])|(?<=[>])\\s{2,}(?=)|(?<=&ndsp;)\\s{2,}(?=[<])", [String].Empty)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Return bodyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine
8578118Di2015UniqueSeparator        Dim request As HttpRequest = context.RequestDi2015NewLine        Dim response As HttpResponse = context.ResponseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dim browserAcceptedEncoding As String = request.Headers("Accept-Encoding")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If Not String.IsNullOrEmpty(browserAcceptedEncoding) ThenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            browserAcceptedEncoding = browserAcceptedEncoding.ToLowerInvariantDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            If (browserAcceptedEncoding.Contains("gzip")) ThenDi2015NewLine                response.AppendHeader("Content-encoding", "gzip")Di2015NewLine                response.Filter = New GZipStream(response.Filter, CompressionMode.Compress)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ElseIf (browserAcceptedEncoding.Contains("deflate")) ThenDi2015NewLine                response.AppendHeader("Content-encoding", "deflate")Di2015NewLine                response.Filter = New DeflateStream(response.Filter, CompressionMode.Compress)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine

8578507Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Example : INotifyPropertyChanging, INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangingEventHandler PropertyChanging;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected bool OnPropertyChanging<T>(string propertyName, T originalValue, T newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = this.PropertyChanging;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var args = new PropertyChangingCancelEventArgs<T>(propertyName, originalValue, newValue);Di2015NewLine            handler(this, args);Di2015NewLine            return !args.Cancel;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnPropertyChanged<T>(string propertyName, T previousValue, T currentValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handler = this.PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine            handler(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs<T>(propertyName, previousValue, currentValue));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int _ExampleValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ExampleValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _ExampleValue; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_ExampleValue != value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.OnPropertyChanging("ExampleValue", _ExampleValue, value))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var previousValue = _ExampleValue;Di2015NewLine                    _ExampleValue = value;Di2015NewLine                    this.OnPropertyChanged("ExampleValue", previousValue, value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8578507Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var exampleObject = new Example();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        exampleObject.PropertyChanging += new PropertyChangingEventHandler(exampleObject_PropertyChanging);Di2015NewLine        exampleObject.PropertyChanged += new PropertyChangedEventHandler(exampleObject_PropertyChanged);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        exampleObject.ExampleValue = 123;Di2015NewLine        exampleObject.ExampleValue = 100;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void exampleObject_PropertyChanging(object sender, PropertyChangingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.PropertyName == "ExampleValue")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int originalValue = ((PropertyChangingCancelEventArgs<int>)e).OriginalValue;Di2015NewLine            int newValue = ((PropertyChangingCancelEventArgs<int>)e).NewValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // do not allow the property to be changed if the new value is less than the original valueDi2015NewLine            if(newValue < originalValue)Di2015NewLine                ((PropertyChangingCancelEventArgs)e).Cancel = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void exampleObject_PropertyChanged(object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.PropertyName == "ExampleValue")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int previousValue = ((PropertyChangedEventArgs<int>)e).PreviousValue;Di2015NewLine            int currentValue = ((PropertyChangedEventArgs<int>)e).CurrentValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8578939Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void InjectMissingData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataLine lastDataLine = null;Di2015NewLine    using (var writer = new StreamWriter(File.Create("c:\\\\temp\\\\out.txt")))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader("c:\\\\temp\\\\in.txt"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var dataLine = DataLine.Parse(reader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (lastDataLine != null && dataLine.Occurence - lastDataLine.Occurence > TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lastDataLine = new DataLine(lastDataLine.Occurence + TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1), lastDataLine.Data);Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine(lastDataLine.Line);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine(dataLine.Line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lastDataLine = dataLine;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DataLineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static DataLine Parse(string line)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var timeString = string.Format("{0}:{1}:{2}", line.Substring(0, 2), line.Substring(2, 2),Di2015NewLine                                       line.Substring(4, 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new DataLine(TimeSpan.Parse(timeString), long.Parse(line.Substring(7, line.Length - 7).Trim()));Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataLine(TimeSpan occurence, long data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Occurence = occurence;Di2015NewLine        Data = data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TimeSpan Occurence { get; 8580650Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SQLToCSV(string query, string Filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connection);Di2015NewLine    conn.Open();Di2015NewLine    SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(query, conn);Di2015NewLine    SqlDataReader dr = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (System.IO.StreamWriter fs = new System.IO.StreamWriter(Filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Loop through the fields and add headersDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < dr.FieldCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string name = dr.GetName(i);Di2015NewLine            if (name.Contains(","))Di2015NewLine                name = "\\"" + name + "\\"";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            fs.Write(name + ",");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        fs.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Loop through the rows and output the dataDi2015NewLine        while (dr.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < dr.FieldCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string value = dr[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine                if (value.Contains(","))Di2015NewLine                    value = "\\"" + value + "\\"";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                fs.Write(value + ",");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            fs.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8582374Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines whether the collection is null or contains no elements.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The IEnumerable type.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="enumerable">The enumerable, which may be null or empty.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    ///     <c>true</c> if the IEnumerable is null or empty; otherwise, <c>false</c>.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsNullOrEmpty<T>(this IEnumerable<T> enumerable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (enumerable == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /* If this is a list, use the Count property for efficiency. Di2015NewLine         * The Count property is O(1) while IEnumerable.Count() is O(N). */Di2015NewLine        var collection = enumerable as ICollection<T>;Di2015NewLine        if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return collection.Count < 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return !enumerable.Any(); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8587651Di2015UniqueSeparatorFoo
8587651Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate delegate double FooDelegate(int a, double b, string c);Di2015NewLine
8587651Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a delegate to FooDi2015NewLineFooDelegate fooDelegate = Foo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Start executing Foo asynchronously with arguments a, b and c.Di2015NewLinevar asyncResult = fooDelegate.BeginInvoke(a, b, c, null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// You can then wait on the completion of Foo using the AsyncWaitHandle property of asyncResultDi2015NewLineif (!asyncResult.CompletedSynchronously)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Wait until Foo completesDi2015NewLine    asyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Finally, the return value can be retrieved using:Di2015NewLinevar result = fooDelegate.EndInvoke(asyncResult);Di2015NewLine
8587651Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a delegate to FooDi2015NewLineFooDelegate fooDelegate = Foo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar asyncResults = new List<IAsyncResult>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Start multiple calls to Foo() in parallel. The loop can be adjusted as required (while, for, foreach).Di2015NewLinewhile (...)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Start executing Foo asynchronously with arguments a, b and c.Di2015NewLine    // Collect the async results in a list for laterDi2015NewLine    asyncResults.Add(fooDelegate.BeginInvoke(a, b, c, null, null));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// List to collect the result of each invocationDi2015NewLinevar results = new List<double>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Wait for completion of all of the asynchronous invocationsDi2015NewLineforeach (var asyncResult in asyncResults)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!asyncResult.CompletedSynchronously)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        asyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Collect the result of the invocation (results will appear in the list in the same order that the invocation was begun above.Di2015NewLine    results.Add(fooDelegate.EndInvoke(asyncResult));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// At this point, all of the asynchronous invocations have returned, and the result of each invocation is stored in the results list.Di2015NewLine

8592869Di2015UniqueSeparatorSqlConnection pubsConn = new SqlConnection("Data Source=localhost;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=pubs;");Di2015NewLineSqlCommand logoCMD = new SqlCommand("SELECT pub_id, logo FROM pub_info", pubsConn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFileStream fs;                          // Writes the BLOB to a file (*.bmp).Di2015NewLineBinaryWriter bw;                        // Streams the BLOB to the FileStream object.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint bufferSize = 100;                   // Size of the BLOB buffer.Di2015NewLinebyte[] outbyte = new byte[bufferSize];  // The BLOB byte[] buffer to be filled by GetBytes.Di2015NewLinelong retval;                            // The bytes returned from GetBytes.Di2015NewLinelong startIndex = 0;                    // The starting position in the BLOB output.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring pub_id = "";                     // The publisher id to use in the file name.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Open the connection and read data into the DataReader.Di2015NewLinepubsConn.Open();Di2015NewLineSqlDataReader myReader = logoCMD.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.SequentialAccess);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (myReader.Read())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Get the publisher id, which must occur before getting the logo.Di2015NewLine  pub_id = myReader.GetString(0);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Create a file to hold the output.Di2015NewLine  fs = new FileStream("logo" + pub_id + ".bmp", FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine  bw = new BinaryWriter(fs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Reset the starting byte for the new BLOB.Di2015NewLine  startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Read the bytes into outbyte[] and retain the number of bytes returned.Di2015NewLine  retval = myReader.GetBytes(1, startIndex, outbyte, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Continue reading and writing while there are bytes beyond the size of the buffer.Di2015NewLine  while (retval == bufferSize)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    bw.Write(outbyte);Di2015NewLine    bw.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Reposition the start index to the end of the last buffer and fill the buffer.Di2015NewLine    startIndex += bufferSize;Di2015NewLine    retval = myReader.GetBytes(1, startIndex, outbyte, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Write the remaining buffer.Di2015NewLine  bw.Write(outbyte, 0, (int)retval - 1);Di2015NewLine  bw.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Close the output file.Di2015NewLine  bw.Close();Di2015NewLine  fs.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Close the reader and the connection.Di2015NewLinemyReader.Close();Di2015NewLinepubsConn.Close();Di2015NewLine

8594772Di2015UniqueSeparatorint HexDistance(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2) {Di2015NewLine  int y1d = (y1 << 1) | (x1 & 1);Di2015NewLine  int y2d = (y2 << 1) | (x2 & 1);Di2015NewLine  int dx = Math.Abs(x2 - x1);Di2015NewLine  int dyd = Math.Abs(y2d - y1d);Di2015NewLine  return (dx < dyd) ? (dyd - dx) / 2 + dx : dx;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8595198Di2015UniqueSeparator public static Control FindControlRecursive(Control ctlRoot, string sControlId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if this control is the one we are looking for, break from the recursion    Di2015NewLine        // and return the control.    Di2015NewLine        if (ctlRoot.ID == sControlId)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ctlRoot;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // loop the child controls of this parent control and call recursively.    Di2015NewLine        foreach (Control ctl in ctlRoot.Controls)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Control ctlFound = FindControlRecursive(ctl, sControlId);Di2015NewLine            // if we found the control, return it.        Di2015NewLine            if (ctlFound != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ctlFound;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }// we never found the control so just return null.    Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8597315Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic MethodInfo GetMethodFromEnumerable(string methodName, params Func<MethodInfo, bool>[] filters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var methods = typeof( Enumerable )Di2015NewLine                .GetMethods( BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public )Di2015NewLine                .Where( mi => mi.Name == methodName );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            methods = filters.Aggregate( methods, (current, filter) => current.Where( filter ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return methods.First( );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MethodInfo WhereMethod(Type collectionType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the Func<T,bool> versionDi2015NewLine            var getWhereMethod = GetMethodFromEnumerable( "Where",Di2015NewLine                                    mi => mi.GetParameters( )[1].ParameterType.GetGenericArguments( ).Count( ) == 2 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return getWhereMethod.MakeGenericMethod( collectionType );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MethodInfo CountMethod(Type collectionType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var getCountMethod = GetMethodFromEnumerable( "Count" ); // There can be only oneDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return getCountMethod.MakeGenericMethod( collectionType );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

8598290Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<int, bool> set = new Dictionary<int, bool>();Di2015NewLinechar[] buffer = new char[3];Di2015NewLineint count = 0;Di2015NewLinefor (int c1 = (int)'A'; c1 <= (int)'z'; c1++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    buffer[0] = (char)c1;Di2015NewLine    for (int c2 = (int)'A'; c2 <= (int)'z'; c2++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer[1] = (char)c2;Di2015NewLine        for (int c3 = (int)'A'; c3 <= (int)'z'; c3++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer[2] = (char)c3;Di2015NewLine            string str = new string(buffer);Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine            int hash = str.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            if (set.ContainsKey(hash))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Collision for {0}", str);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            set[hash] = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Generated {0} of {1} hashes", set.Count, count);Di2015NewLine

8602763Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// ClassExtensionsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinestatic class ClassExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Converts an object to nullable.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="P">The object type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="s">The object value.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static Nullable<P> ToNullable<P>(this string s) where P : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Nullable<P> result = new Nullable<P>();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(s))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TypeConverter conv = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(typeof(P));Di2015NewLine                result = (P)conv.ConvertFrom(s);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch { }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Converts a dictionary of property values into a class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The class type.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">The properties dictionary.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An instance of T with property values set to the values defined in the dictionary.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T ToClass<T>(this IDictionary<string, string> source) where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type classType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        T returnClass = new T();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var keyValue in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo prop = classType.GetProperty(keyValue.Key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MethodInfo method = typeof(ClassExtensions).GetMethod("ToNullable");Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo generic = method.MakeGenericMethod(prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            object convertedValue = generic.Invoke(keyValue.Value, new object[] { keyValue.Value });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            prop.SetValue(returnClass, convertedValue, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnClass;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// TestClassDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineclass TestClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Property1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public long Property2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Program.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IDictionary<string, string> properties = new Dictionary<string, string> { { "Property1", "1" }, { "Property2", "2" } };Di2015NewLine        properties.ToClass<TestClass>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8602803Di2015UniqueSeparatorTestParse
8602803Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T ToClass<T>(this IDictionary<string, string> source) where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    T ret = new T();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var keyValue in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyInfo = type.GetProperty(keyValue.Key);Di2015NewLine        propertyInfo.SetValue(ret, keyValue.Value.ToString().TestParse(propertyInfo.PropertyType), null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static object TestParse(this string value, Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(type).ConvertFromString(value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8602810Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string ReadEndTokens(string filename, Int64 numberOfTokens, Encoding encoding, string tokenSeparator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (typeof(SDAccess))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PersistentStorage sdPS = new PersistentStorage("SD");Di2015NewLine            sdPS.MountFileSystem();Di2015NewLine            string rootDirectory = VolumeInfo.GetVolumes()[0].RootDirectory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int sizeOfChar = 1;//The only encoding suppourted by NETMF4.1 is UTF8Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = encoding.GetBytes(tokenSeparator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(rootDirectory + @"\\" + filename, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Int64 tokenCount = 0;Di2015NewLine                Int64 endPosition = fs.Length / sizeOfChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (Int64 position = sizeOfChar; position < endPosition; position += sizeOfChar)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    fs.Seek(-position, SeekOrigin.End);Di2015NewLine                    fs.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    encoding.GetChars(buffer);Di2015NewLine                    if (encoding.GetChars(buffer)[0].ToString() + encoding.GetChars(buffer)[1].ToString() == tokenSeparator)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tokenCount++;Di2015NewLine                        if (tokenCount == numberOfTokens)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            byte[] returnBuffer = new byte[fs.Length - fs.Position];Di2015NewLine                            fs.Read(returnBuffer, 0, returnBuffer.Length);                          Di2015NewLine                            sdPS.UnmountFileSystem();// Unmount file systemDi2015NewLine                            sdPS.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                            return GetString(returnBuffer);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // handle case where number of tokens in file is less than numberOfTokensDi2015NewLine                fs.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                buffer = new byte[fs.Length];Di2015NewLine                fs.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                sdPS.UnmountFileSystem();// Unmount file systemDi2015NewLine                sdPS.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                return GetString(buffer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //As GetString is not implemented in NETMF4.1 I've done this methodDi2015NewLine    public static string GetString(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string cadena = "";Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < bytes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            cadena += Encoding.UTF8.GetChars(bytes)[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine        return cadena;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8604093Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function GetGrayScalePalette() As ColorPalette  Di2015NewLine    Dim bmp As Bitmap = New Bitmap(1, 1, Imaging.PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim monoPalette As ColorPalette = bmp.Palette  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim entries() As Color = monoPalette.Entries  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim i As Integer Di2015NewLine    For i = 0 To 256 - 1 Step i + 1  Di2015NewLine        entries(i) = Color.FromArgb(i, i, i)  Di2015NewLine    Next Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return monoPalette  Di2015NewLineEnd Function Di2015NewLine

8604525Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string PrepareDataSet(int LAST_TRIAL_USER_DETAIL_ID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection("my connection string");Di2015NewLine        string _cmdText = "Select TOP 10 TRIAL_USER_DETAIL_ID,Convert(Varchar,TRIAL_ACTIVATE_DATE,103) ActivateDate,TRIAL_CD_SERIAL_NO From TDSMAN_TRIAL_USER_DETAIL Where TRIAL_USER_DETAIL_ID >" + LAST_TRIAL_USER_DETAIL_ID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SqlDataAdapter da = new System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter(_cmdText, conn);Di2015NewLine        DataSet ds = new System.Data.DataSet();Di2015NewLine        da.Fill(ds,  "User_Detail");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get the previous data from chcheDi2015NewLine        var parentDt = (DataSet)_cache["key For previous data in cache"];Di2015NewLine        ds.Merge(parentDt);  Di2015NewLine        tblUserDetail.DataSource = ds;Di2015NewLine        tblUserDetail.DataBind();  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //this when this function is in the page Di2015NewLine        //but if the function is in the handler you can return dataset to the page and //bind it to the tblUserDetail GridView like aboveDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Notes:Di2015NewLine        //-you don't need to build rows you just bind the new ds to the gridview.Di2015NewLine        //-when you get the first data on page load save the data into the cache or Di2015NewLine        //any state management variables.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8604635Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var blahs = new List<Blah>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            new Blah(1, 0), new Blah(2, 1),Di2015NewLine                            new Blah(3, 2), new Blah(2, 3)Di2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        blahs.Add(blahs[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //contains all 4 entriesDi2015NewLine        var set = new HashSet<Blah>(blahs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //contains all 4 entriesDi2015NewLine        var sortedset = new SortedSet<Blah>(blahs, new BlahComparer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BlahDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Blah(double value, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine        Index = index;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Index { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BlahComparer : Comparer<Blah>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override int Compare(Blah x, Blah y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // needs null checksDi2015NewLine        var referenceEquals = ReferenceEquals(x, y);Di2015NewLine        if (referenceEquals)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var compare = Comparer<double>.Default.Compare(x.Value, y.Value);Di2015NewLine        if (compare == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            compare = Comparer<int>.Default.Compare(x.Index, y.Index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return compare;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8608891Di2015UniqueSeparatorStream fs = new FileStream(@file, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(fs);Di2015NewLine  //PE Header starts @ 0x3C (60). Its a 4 byte header.Di2015NewLine  fs.Position = 0x3C;Di2015NewLine  uint peHeader = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine  //Moving to PE Header start location...Di2015NewLine  fs.Position = peHeader;Di2015NewLine  uint peHeaderSignature = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine  ushort machine = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine  ushort sections = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine  uint timestamp = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine  uint pSymbolTable = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine  uint noOfSymbol = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine  ushort optionalHeaderSize = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine  ushort characteristics = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  long posEndOfHeader = fs.Position;Di2015NewLine  ushort magic = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int off = 0x60; // Offset to data directories for 32Bit PE imagesDi2015NewLine                  // See section 3.4 of the PE format specification.Di2015NewLine  if (magic == 0x20b) //0x20b == PE32+ (64Bit), 0x10b == PE32 (32Bit)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    off = 0x70;  // Offset to data directories for 64Bit PE imagesDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  fs.Position = posEndOfHeader;       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  uint[] dataDictionaryRVA = new uint[16];Di2015NewLine  uint[] dataDictionarySize = new uint[16];Di2015NewLine  ushort dataDictionaryStart = Convert.ToUInt16(Convert.ToUInt16(fs.Position) + off);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  fs.Position = dataDictionaryStart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < 15; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    dataDictionaryRVA[i] = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine    dataDictionarySize[i] = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (dataDictionaryRVA[14] == 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine   return false;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine finallyDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine   fs.Close();Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
