8609704Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication1 {Di2015NewLine    internal static class Program {Di2015NewLine        [STAThread]Di2015NewLine        private static void Main() {Di2015NewLine            var calculator = new Calculator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// DivideByZero - the result should be -1Di2015NewLine            var data1 = new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 0, C = 1 };Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<DataInfo, decimal?>> expression1 = x => x.A / x.B + x.C;Di2015NewLine            var result1 = calculator.Calcul(data1, expression1, "N0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// Negative 1 - the result should be -Di2015NewLine            var data2 = new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 5, C = -1 };Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<DataInfo, decimal?>> expression2 = x => x.A / x.B + x.C;Di2015NewLine            var result2 = calculator.Calcul(data2, expression2, "N0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// Negative 2 - the result should be CDi2015NewLine            var data3 = new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 5, C = -2 };Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<DataInfo, decimal?>> expression3 = x => x.A / x.B + x.C;Di2015NewLine            var result3 = calculator.Calcul(data3, expression3, "N0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// the result should be 3Di2015NewLine            var data4 = new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 5, C = 1 };Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<DataInfo, decimal?>> expression4 = x => x.A / x.B + x.C;Di2015NewLine            var result4 = calculator.Calcul(data4, expression4, "N0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// DivideByZero - the result should be -1Di2015NewLine            var data5 = new List<DataInfo> {Di2015NewLine                                    new DataInfo {A = 10, B = 0, C = 1},Di2015NewLine                                    new DataInfo {A = 10, B = 0, C = 1}Di2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression<Func<IEnumerable<DataInfo>, decimal?>> expression5 = x => x.Sum(y => y.A) / x.Sum(y => y.B) + x.Sum(y => y.C);Di2015NewLine            var result5 = calculator.Calcul(data5, expression5, "N0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// the result should be 4Di2015NewLine            var data6 = new List<DataInfo> {Di2015NewLine                                    new DataInfo {A = 10, B = 5, C = 1},Di2015NewLine                                    new DataInfo {A = 10, B = 5, C = 1}Di2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression<Func<IEnumerable<DataInfo>, decimal?>> expression6 = x => x.Sum(y => y.A) / x.Sum(y => y.B) + x.Sum(y => y.C);Di2015NewLine            var result6 = calculator.Calcul(data6, expression6, "N0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// the result should be -Di2015NewLine            var data7 = new List<DataInfo> {Di2015NewLine                                    new DataInfo {A = 10, B = 5, C = -1},Di2015NewLine                                    new DataInfo {A = 10, B = 5, C = 1}Di2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression<Func<IEnumerable<DataInfo>, decimal?>> expression7 = x => x.Sum(y => y.A) / x.Sum(y => y.B) + x.Sum(y => y.C);Di2015NewLine            var result7 = calculator.Calcul(data7, expression7, "N0");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //// the result should be 14Di2015NewLine            var c1 = 1;Di2015NewLine            var c2 = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var data8 = new DataInfo { A = 10, B = 1, C = 1 };Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<DataInfo, decimal?>> expression8 = x => x.A / x.B + x.C + c1 + c2;Di2015NewLine            var result8 = calculator.Calcul(data8, expression8, "N0");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Calculator {Di2015NewLine        public string Calcul<T>(T data, LambdaExpression query, string format) {Di2015NewLine            string reportValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (HasIssue(data, query, out reportValue)) {Di2015NewLine                return reportValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // executes the aggregatesDi2015NewLine            query = (LambdaExpression)ExpressionPreProcessor.PreProcessor(data, query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // checks the rules against the results of the aggregatesDi2015NewLine            if (HasIssue(data, query, out reportValue)) {Di2015NewLine                return reportValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Delegate lambda = query.Compile();Di2015NewLine            decimal? result = (decimal?)lambda.DynamicInvoke(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result != nullDi2015NewLine                ? result.Value.ToString(format)Di2015NewLine                : TypeDonnee.Manquante.ReportValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool HasIssue(object data, LambdaExpression query, out string reportValue) {Di2015NewLine            reportValue = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var rulesCheckerResult = RulesChecker.Check(data, query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (rulesCheckerResult.HasManquante) {Di2015NewLine                reportValue = TypeDonnee.Manquante.ReportValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (rulesCheckerResult.HasDivisionParZero) {Di2015NewLine                reportValue = TypeDonnee.DivisionParZero.ReportValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (rulesCheckerResult.HasNonDiffusable) {Di2015NewLine                reportValue = TypeDonnee.NonDiffusable.ReportValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (rulesCheckerResult.HasConfidentielle) {Di2015NewLine                reportValue = TypeDonnee.Confidentielle.ReportValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return reportValue != null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class ExpressionPreProcessor : ExpressionVisitor {Di2015NewLine        private readonly object _source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Expression PreProcessor(object source, Expression expression) {Di2015NewLine            if (!IsValidSource(source)) {Di2015NewLine                return expression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var visitor = new ExpressionPreProcessor(source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return visitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool IsValidSource(object source) {Di2015NewLine            if (source == null) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var type = source.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return type.IsGenericType && type.GetInterface("IEnumerable") != null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ExpressionPreProcessor(object source) {Di2015NewLine            this._source = source;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitMethodCall(MethodCallExpression node) {Di2015NewLine            if (node.Method.DeclaringType == typeof(Enumerable) && node.Arguments.Count == 2) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch (node.Method.Name) {Di2015NewLine                    case "Count":Di2015NewLine                    case "Min":Di2015NewLine                    case "Max":Di2015NewLine                    case "Sum":Di2015NewLine                    case "Average":Di2015NewLine                        var lambda = node.Arguments[1] as LambdaExpression;Di2015NewLine                        var lambaDelegate = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine                        var value = node.Method.Invoke(null, new object[] { this._source, lambaDelegate });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        return Expression.Constant(value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.VisitMethodCall(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class RulesChecker : ExpressionVisitor {Di2015NewLine        private readonly object data;Di2015NewLine        private bool hasConfidentielle = false;Di2015NewLine        private bool hasNonDiffusable = false;Di2015NewLine        private bool hasDivisionParZero = false;Di2015NewLine        private bool hasManquante = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public RulesChecker(object data) {Di2015NewLine            this.data = data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static RulesCheckerResult Check(object data, Expression expression) {Di2015NewLine            if (IsIEnumerable(data)) {Di2015NewLine                var result = new RulesCheckerResult(false, false, false, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                IEnumerable dataItems = (IEnumerable)data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (object dataItem in dataItems) {Di2015NewLine                    result = MergeResults(result, GetResults(dataItem, expression));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                return GetResults(data, expression);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static RulesCheckerResult MergeResults(RulesCheckerResult results1, RulesCheckerResult results2) {Di2015NewLine            var hasConfidentielle = results1.HasConfidentielle || results2.HasConfidentielle;Di2015NewLine            var hasDivisionParZero = results1.HasDivisionParZero || results2.HasDivisionParZero;Di2015NewLine            var hasManquante = results1.HasManquante || results2.HasManquante;Di2015NewLine            var hasNonDiffusable = results1.HasNonDiffusable || results2.HasNonDiffusable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new RulesCheckerResult(hasConfidentielle, hasNonDiffusable, hasDivisionParZero, hasManquante);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static RulesCheckerResult GetResults(object data, Expression expression) {Di2015NewLine            var visitor = new RulesChecker(data);Di2015NewLine            visitor.Visit(expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new RulesCheckerResult(Di2015NewLine                visitor.hasConfidentielle,Di2015NewLine                visitor.hasNonDiffusable,Di2015NewLine                visitor.hasDivisionParZero,Di2015NewLine                visitor.hasManquante);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool IsIEnumerable(object source) {Di2015NewLine            if (source == null) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var type = source.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return type.IsGenericType && type.GetInterface("IEnumerable") != null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node) {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.hasDivisionParZero && node.NodeType == ExpressionType.Divide) {Di2015NewLine                if (node.Right.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess) {Di2015NewLine                    var rightMemeberExpression = (MemberExpression)node.Right;Di2015NewLine                    var propertyInfo = (PropertyInfo)rightMemeberExpression.Member;Di2015NewLine                    var value = Convert.ToInt32(propertyInfo.GetValue(this.data, null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    this.hasDivisionParZero = value == 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (node.Right.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant) {Di2015NewLine                    var rightConstantExpression = (ConstantExpression)node.Right;Di2015NewLine                    var value = Convert.ToInt32(rightConstantExpression.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    this.hasDivisionParZero = value == 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.VisitBinary(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitConstant(ConstantExpression node) {Di2015NewLine            this.CheckValue(this.ConvertToNullableInt(node.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.VisitConstant(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node) {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.hasConfidentielle || !this.hasNonDiffusable || !this.hasManquante) {Di2015NewLine                var propertyInfo = node.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (propertyInfo != null) {Di2015NewLine                    var value = propertyInfo.GetValue(this.data, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    this.CheckValue(this.ConvertToNullableInt(value));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CheckValue(int? value) {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.hasManquante) {Di2015NewLine                this.hasManquante = value == TypeDonnee.Manquante.BdValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!this.hasConfidentielle) {Di2015NewLine                this.hasConfidentielle = value == TypeDonnee.Confidentielle.BdValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!this.hasNonDiffusable) {Di2015NewLine                this.hasNonDiffusable = value == TypeDonnee.NonDiffusable.BdValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int? ConvertToNullableInt(object value) {Di2015NewLine            if (!value.GetType().IsPrimitive) {Di2015NewLine                return int.MinValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // MTO.Framework.Common.Convert.To<int?>(value);Di2015NewLine            return (int?)value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class RulesCheckerResult {Di2015NewLine        public bool HasConfidentielle { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public bool HasNonDiffusable { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public bool HasDivisionParZero { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public bool HasManquante { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public RulesCheckerResult(bool hasConfidentielle, bool hasNonDiffusable, bool hasDivisionParZero, bool hasManquante) {Di2015NewLine            this.HasConfidentielle = hasConfidentielle;Di2015NewLine            this.HasNonDiffusable = hasNonDiffusable;Di2015NewLine            this.HasDivisionParZero = hasDivisionParZero;Di2015NewLine            this.HasManquante = hasManquante;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class TypeDonnee {Di2015NewLine        public static readonly TypeValues Manquante = new TypeValues(null, "-");Di2015NewLine        public static readonly TypeValues Confidentielle = new TypeValues(-1, "-");Di2015NewLine        public static readonly TypeValues NonDiffusable = new TypeValues(-2, "C");Di2015NewLine        public static readonly TypeValues DivisionParZero = new TypeValues(0, "-1");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class TypeValues {Di2015NewLine        public int? (Press '-1' to Stop)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// try method is inside, replaced old try and catchDi2015NewLine            var Input_is_Int = int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!Input_is_Int || length == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("That is an Invalid Number, Please try again");Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                bypass = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (Input_is_Int && length != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    passwordBuilder.Append(GetRandomChar());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Password: " + passwordBuilder.ToString());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Press any key to continue");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                bypass = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (!bypass);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// Union of ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ, 0123456789 and !"#$%&'()*+,-./ Di2015NewLine    static char[] _lookupTable = Enumerable.Range(65, 26).Union(Enumerable.Range(48, 10).Union(Enumerable.Range(33, 14))).Select(i => (char)i).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Random _r = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static char GetRandomChar()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var index = _r.Next(0, _lookupTable.Length);Di2015NewLine        return _lookupTable[index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

"2109" : "2965");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Show the string representation of the cookie.Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine ("String: {0}", cook.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8617095Di2015UniqueSeparator// untestedDi2015NewLinestatic class CriticalTasksDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static HashSet<Task> tasks = new HashSet<Task>();Di2015NewLine    static object locker = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // when starting a TaskDi2015NewLine    public static void Add(Task t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(locker)Di2015NewLine           tasks.Add(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // When a Tasks completesDi2015NewLine    public static void Remove(Task t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(locker)Di2015NewLine           tasks.Remove(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Having to call Remove() is not so convenient, this is a blunt solution. 8617637Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class AStarWrapper<TVertex, TEdge>Di2015NewLine    where TEdge : IEdge<TVertex>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private TVertex target;Di2015NewLine        private AStarShortestPathAlgorithm<TVertex, TEdge> innerAlgorithm;Di2015NewLine        public AStarWrapper(AStarShortestPathAlgorithm<TVertex, TEdge> innerAlgo, TVertex root, TVertex target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            innerAlgorithm = innerAlgo;Di2015NewLine            this.innerAlgorithm.SetRootVertex(root);Di2015NewLine            this.target = target;Di2015NewLine            this.innerAlgorithm.FinishVertex += new VertexAction<TVertex>(innerAlgorithm_FinishVertex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        void innerAlgorithm_FinishVertex(TVertex vertex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (object.Equals(vertex, target))Di2015NewLine                this.innerAlgorithm.Abort();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public double Compute()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.innerAlgorithm.Compute();Di2015NewLine            return this.innerAlgorithm.Distances[target];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double ComputeDistanceBetween<TVertex, TEdge>(this AStarShortestPathAlgorithm<TVertex, TEdge> algo, TVertex start, TVertex end)Di2015NewLine        where TEdge : IEdge<TVertex>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var wrap = new AStarWrapper<TVertex, TEdge>(algo, start, end);Di2015NewLine        return wrap.Compute();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8618870Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string GetPolicy(string pWsdlPath, string pOperationName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XDocument wsdlDocument = XDocument.Load(pWsdlPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XName operationElementName = XName.Get("operation", "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/");Di2015NewLine        XName policyReferenceElementName = XName.Get("PolicyReference", "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy");Di2015NewLine        XName policyElementName = XName.Get("Policy", "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy");Di2015NewLine        XName idAttributeName = XName.Get("Id", "http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wsswssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var operationPolicy = from operation in wsdlDocument.Descendants(operationElementName)Di2015NewLine                              where operation.Attribute("name").Value == "concat"Di2015NewLine                              from policyReference in operation.Descendants(policyReferenceElementName)Di2015NewLine                              where policyReference.Attribute("URI").Value.StartsWith("#")Di2015NewLine                              let uri = policyReference.Attribute("URI").Value.Substring(1)Di2015NewLine                              from policy in wsdlDocument.Descendants(policyElementName)Di2015NewLine                              where policy.Attribute(idAttributeName).Value == uriDi2015NewLine                              select policy.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return operationPolicy.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8618909Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class Program {Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(GetNumber(7));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(GetNumber(8));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(GetNumber(12));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(GetNumber(500));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetNumber(int length) {Di2015NewLine        return string.Concat(RandomDigits().Take(length));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<int> RandomDigits() {Di2015NewLine        var rng = new Random(System.Environment.TickCount);Di2015NewLine        while (true) yield return rng.Next(10);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8618909Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class Program {Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(GetNumber(12));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetNumber(int length) {Di2015NewLine        var rng = new Random(Environment.TickCount);Di2015NewLine        return string.Concat(Enumerable.Range(0, length).Select((index) => rng.Next(10).ToString()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8619214Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class DataEncryptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public static string Encrypt(string input, string key)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      byte[] inputArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(input);Di2015NewLine      TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tripleDES = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Key = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine      ICryptoTransform cTransform = tripleDES.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine      byte[] resultArray = cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(inputArray, 0, inputArray.Length);Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Clear();Di2015NewLine      return Convert.ToBase64String(resultArray, 0, resultArray.Length);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static string Decrypt(string input, string key)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      byte[] inputArray = Convert.FromBase64String(input);Di2015NewLine      TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tripleDES = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Key = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine      ICryptoTransform cTransform = tripleDES.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine      byte[] resultArray = cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(inputArray, 0, inputArray.Length);Di2015NewLine      tripleDES.Clear();Di2015NewLine      return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(resultArray);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8628399Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create an md5 sum string of this stringDi2015NewLinestatic public string GetMd5Sum(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine// First we need to convert the string into bytes, whichDi2015NewLine// means using a text encoder.Di2015NewLineEncoder enc = System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetEncoder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a buffer large enough to hold the stringDi2015NewLinebyte[] unicodeText = new byte[str.Length * 2];Di2015NewLineenc.GetBytes(str.ToCharArray(), 0, str.Length, unicodeText, 0, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now that we have a byte array we can ask the CSP to hash itDi2015NewLineMD5 md5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLinebyte[] result = md5.ComputeHash(unicodeText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Build the final string by converting each byteDi2015NewLine// into hex and appending it to a StringBuilderDi2015NewLineStringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinefor (int i=0;i<result.Length;i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(result[i].ToString("X2"));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// And return itDi2015NewLinereturn sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8639316Di2015UniqueSeparatorStreamReader
8639316Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Reads a string literal from a file, essentially implementing the regex pattern /\\"{.*}\\"/.Di2015NewLine    ///     Ignores escape characters (for instance, "\\"" will fail)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fs">The file stream to read from.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The string literal without it's quotes upon success, null otherwise.</returns>Di2015NewLine    static string ReadString(FileStream fs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!fs.CanRead)Di2015NewLine            return null; // cant read from stream, throw an exception hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var reader = new StreamReader(fs);Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool inString = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.Peek() < 0)Di2015NewLine                return null; // reached EOF before string ended, throw exception hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            char ch = (char)reader.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (inString)Di2015NewLine                if (ch == '"')Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    sb.Append(ch);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                if (ch == '"')Di2015NewLine                    inString = true;Di2015NewLine                else if (!char.IsWhiteSpace(ch))Di2015NewLine                    return null; // string does not start with quote, throw exception hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8647582Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Node Left { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Node Right { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Node(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8647582Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Node GetSubtree(int value, int depth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int foundDepth;Di2015NewLine    return GetSubtreeHelper(value, depth, out foundDepth);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Node GetSubtreeHelper(int value, int depth, out int foundDepth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Value == value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foundDepth = 0;Di2015NewLine        return depth == foundDepth ? this : null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (Left != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var node = Left.GetSubtreeHelper(value, depth, out foundDepth);Di2015NewLine        if (foundDepth != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ++foundDepth == depth ? this : node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (Right != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var node = Right.GetSubtreeHelper(value, depth, out foundDepth);Di2015NewLine        if (foundDepth != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ++foundDepth == depth ? this : node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foundDepth = -1;Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8650321Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TEnum NextEnum<TEnum>(TEnum value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!typeof(TEnum).IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Expected type of System.Enum", "value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var values = Enum.GetValues(typeof (TEnum));Di2015NewLine    var index = Array.IndexOf(values, value);Di2015NewLine    return (TEnum)Enum.ToObject(typeof (TEnum), values.GetValue((index + 1) % values.Length));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8650651Di2015UniqueSeparator     public static CookieContainer login(string url, string username, string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (url.Length == 0 || username.Length == 0 || password.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Information missing");Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CookieContainer myContainer = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = myContainer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set type to POSTDi2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022)";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Build the new header, this isn't a multipart/form, so it's very simpleDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder data = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        data.Append("username=" + Uri.EscapeDataString(username));Di2015NewLine        data.Append("&password=" + Uri.EscapeDataString(password));Di2015NewLine        data.Append("&login=Login");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a byte array of the data we want to sendDi2015NewLine        byte[] byteData = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the content length in the request headersDi2015NewLine        request.ContentLength = byteData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream postStream;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            postStream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Login - " + e.Message.ToString() + " (GRS)");Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Write dataDi2015NewLine        postStream.Write(byteData, 0, byteData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Login - " + e.Message.ToString() + " (GR)");Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string _url = "http://www.dandrews.net/forum/custom.php";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Store the cookiesDi2015NewLine        if (myContainer.GetCookies(new Uri(url)).Cast<Cookie>().Any(c => c.Name.Contains("_u")))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string strResult = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest _request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(_url);Di2015NewLine            _request.CookieContainer = myContainer;Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse _response = (HttpWebResponse)_request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(_response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                strResult = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                // Close and clean up the StreamReaderDi2015NewLine                sr.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(strResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return myContainer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8658603Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<int> FilterIdsByClient(IEnumerable<int> entityIds) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    // The variable entityIds points to whatever was passed in: A List, according to the edited question.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    entityIds =                                    //this is an assignment, changing the referent of entityIdsDi2015NewLine        MyObjectContext.CreateObjectSet<TEntity>() Di2015NewLine            .Where(x => x.ClientId == _clientId) Di2015NewLine            .Where(x => entityIds.Contains(x.Id))  //this lambda closes over the variable entityIdsDi2015NewLine            .Select(x => x.Id); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The query now has a reference to the *variable* entityIds, not to the object that entityIds pointed to originally.Di2015NewLine    // The value of entityIds has been changed; it now points to the query itself!Di2015NewLine    // The query is therefore operating on itself; this causes the "cycle detected" message.Di2015NewLine    // Because of delayed execution, the query is not executed until the next line of code:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return entityIds.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8666726Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic double getNetworkUtilization(string networkCard){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const int numberOfIterations = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PerformanceCounter bandwidthCounter = new PerformanceCounter("Network Interface", "Current Bandwidth", networkCard);Di2015NewLine            float bandwidth = bandwidthCounter.NextValue();//valor fixo 10Mb/100Mn/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PerformanceCounter dataSentCounter = new PerformanceCounter("Network Interface", "Bytes Sent/sec", networkCard);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PerformanceCounter dataReceivedCounter = new PerformanceCounter("Network Interface", "Bytes Received/sec", networkCard);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            float sendSum = 0;Di2015NewLine            float receiveSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int index = 0; index < numberOfIterations; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sendSum += dataSentCounter.NextValue();Di2015NewLine                receiveSum += dataReceivedCounter.NextValue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            float dataSent = sendSum;Di2015NewLine            float dataReceived = receiveSum;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double utilization = (8 * (dataSent + dataReceived)) / (bandwidth * numberOfIterations) * 100;Di2015NewLine            return utilization;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

8668675Di2015UniqueSeparatorMain structure:Di2015NewLine("((\\\\")|([^"]))*")    Double-quoted tokenDi2015NewLine|                      , orDi2015NewLine('((\\\\')|([^']))*')    single-quoted tokenDi2015NewLine|                      , orDi2015NewLine(\\S+)                  any group of non-space charactersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDouble-quoted token:Di2015NewLine(                      Group startsDi2015NewLine    "                  Initial double-quoteDi2015NewLine    (                  Inner group startsDi2015NewLine        (\\\\")          Either a backslash followed by a double-quoteDi2015NewLine        |              , or  Di2015NewLine        ([^"])         any non-double-quote characterDi2015NewLine    )*                 The inner group repeats any number of times (or zero)Di2015NewLine    "                  Ending double-quoteDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSingle-quoted token:Di2015NewLine(                      Group startsDi2015NewLine    '                  Initial single-quoteDi2015NewLine    (                  Inner group startsDi2015NewLine        (\\\\')          Either a backslash followed by a single-quoteDi2015NewLine        |              , or  Di2015NewLine        ([^'])         any non-single-quote characterDi2015NewLine    )*                 The inner group repeats any number of times (or zero)Di2015NewLine    '                  Ending single-quoteDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineNon-space characters:Di2015NewLine(                      Group startsDi2015NewLine    \\S                 Non-white-space characterDi2015NewLine    +                  , repeated at least onceDi2015NewLine)                      Group endsDi2015NewLine

8673556Di2015UniqueSeparator// Sample times and full hourDi2015NewLineDateTime lastSampleTimeBeforeFullHour = new DateTime(2011, 12, 19, 17, 58, 21);Di2015NewLineDateTime firstSampleTimeAfterFullHour = new DateTime(2011, 12, 19, 18, 13, 21);Di2015NewLineDateTime fullHour = new DateTime(2011, 12, 19, 18, 00, 00);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Times as ticks (most accurate time unit)Di2015NewLinelong t0 = lastSampleTimeBeforeFullHour.Ticks;Di2015NewLinelong t1 = firstSampleTimeAfterFullHour.Ticks;Di2015NewLinelong tf = fullHour.Ticks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Energy samplesDi2015NewLinedouble e0 = 79179.88; // kWh before full hourDi2015NewLinedouble e1 = 79182.13; // kWh after full hourDi2015NewLinedouble ef; // interpolated energy at full hourDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineef = e0 + (tf - t0) * (e1 - e0) / (t1 - t0); // ==> 79180.1275 kWhDi2015NewLine

8680818Di2015UniqueSeparatorgetInversePosition(e);
8680818Di2015UniqueSeparator private void getInversePosition(MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Matrix matrix = Matrix.CreateTranslation(new Vector3(-(Width + img.Width) / 2, -(Height - img.Height) / 2, 0)) *Di2015NewLine                  Matrix.CreateScale(new Vector3(Zoom, Zoom, 1)) *Di2015NewLine                  Matrix.CreateTranslation(new Vector3((Width + img.Width) / 2, (Height - img.Height) / 2, 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        inverse = Matrix.Invert(matrix);Di2015NewLine        Vector2 mousePosition = Vector2.Transform(new Vector2(e.X, e.Y), inverse);Di2015NewLine        mouseRect = new Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle((int)mousePosition.X, (int)mousePosition.Y, 1, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

Shared Function FixedSize(imgPhoto As Image, Width As Integer, Height As Integer) As ImageDi2015NewLine            Dim sourceWidth As Integer = imgPhoto.WidthDi2015NewLine            Dim sourceHeight As Integer = imgPhoto.HeightDi2015NewLine            Dim sourceX As Integer = 0Di2015NewLine            Dim sourceY As Integer = 0Di2015NewLine            Dim destX As Integer = 0Di2015NewLine            Dim destY As Integer = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim nPercent As Single = 0Di2015NewLine            Dim nPercentW As Single = 0Di2015NewLine            Dim nPercentH As Single = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            nPercentW = (CSng(Width) / CSng(sourceWidth))Di2015NewLine            nPercentH = (CSng(Height) / CSng(sourceHeight))Di2015NewLine            If nPercentH < nPercentW ThenDi2015NewLine                nPercent = nPercentHDi2015NewLine                destX = System.Convert.ToInt16((Width - (sourceWidth * nPercent)) / 2)Di2015NewLine grPhoto.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubicDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            grPhoto.DrawImage(imgPhoto, New Rectangle(destX, destY, destWidth, destHeight), New 8681746Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void SO()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string input = "name +value (email)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TestGivenMethod(input, SplitReplace, "SplitReplace");Di2015NewLine    TestGivenMethod(input, JustSplit, "Split");Di2015NewLine    TestGivenMethod(input, WithRegex, "Regex");Di2015NewLine    TestGivenMethod(input, WithLinq, "WithLinq");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void TestGivenMethod(string input, Func<string, string> method, string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("email", method(input));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine    string res = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var email = method(input);Di2015NewLine        res = email;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("email", res);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{1} takes {0} ticks per call", sw.ElapsedTicks/1000000.0, name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring SplitReplace(string val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] parts = val.Split('(');Di2015NewLine    return parts[1].Replace(")", String.Empty);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring JustSplit(string val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] parts = val.Split('(', ')');Di2015NewLine    return parts[1];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Regex method3Regex = new Regex(@"\\(([\\w@]+)\\)");Di2015NewLinestring WithRegex(string val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return method3Regex.Match(val).Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring WithLinq(string val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new string(val.SkipWhile(c => c != '(').Skip(1).TakeWhile(c => c != ')').ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8682290Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SemaphoreDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int _count;Di2015NewLine    private int _maximum;Di2015NewLine    private object _countGuard;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Semaphore(int maximum)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _count = 0;Di2015NewLine        _maximum = maximum;Di2015NewLine        _countGuard = new object();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WaitOne()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_countGuard)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_count < _maximum)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _count++;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(50);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ReleaseOne()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_countGuard)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _count--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BlockingStackDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stack<MyType> _internalStack;Di2015NewLine    private Semaphore _blockUntilAvailable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BlockingStack()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _internalStack = new Stack<MyType>(5);Di2015NewLine        _blockUntilAvailable = new Semaphore(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var obj = new MyType();Di2015NewLine            Add(obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyType Get()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _blockUntilAvailable.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (_internalStack)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var obj = _internalStack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            return obj;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(MyType obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_internalStack)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _internalStack.Push(obj);Di2015NewLine            _blockUntilAvailable.ReleaseOne();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8686091Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<WinText> windows = new List<WinText>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //find the "first" windowDi2015NewLine            IntPtr hWnd = FindWindow("notepad", null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (hWnd != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //find the control window that has the textDi2015NewLine                IntPtr hEdit = FindWindowEx(hWnd, IntPtr.Zero, "edit", null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //initialize the buffer.  using a StringBuilder hereDi2015NewLine                System.Text.StringBuilder sb = new System.Text.StringBuilder(255);  // or length from call with GETTEXTLENGTHDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //get the text from the child controlDi2015NewLine                int RetVal = SendMessage(hEdit, WM_GETTEXT, sb.Capacity, sb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                windows.Add(new WinText() { hWnd = hWnd, Text = sb.ToString() });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //find the next windowDi2015NewLine                hWnd = FindWindowEx(IntPtr.Zero, hWnd, "notepad", null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //do something cleverDi2015NewLine            windows.OrderBy(x => x.Text).ToList().ForEach(y => Console.Write("{0} = {1}\\n", y.hWnd, y.Text));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Write("\\n\\nFound {0} window(s).", windows.Count);Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private struct WinTextDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public IntPtr hWnd;Di2015NewLine            public string Text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const int WM_GETTEXT = 0x0D;Di2015NewLine        const int WM_GETTEXTLENGTH = 0x0E;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        public static extern IntPtr FindWindow(string lpClassName, string lpWindowName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        public static extern int SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, int Param, System.Text.StringBuilder text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        public static extern IntPtr FindWindowEx(IntPtr hwndParent, IntPtr hwndChildAfter, string lpszClass, string lpszWindow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
